The mission is to develop economically viable and scalable solutions to drastically reduce carbon emissions within the decade. The goal is to become the world’s leading manufacturer of water electrolysis systems for hydrogen production using renewable energy: Green Hydrogen

For example, acid groups compatible with many backbone materials, including non-perfluorinated, circular ones. name: 21GEO Edit
elevator_pitch: 21Geo has invented the Precise Motion Technology that enables bearings to support complex motions. The technology comprises a new type of mechanism, on a par with gears, cams and linkages.
description: 21Geo develops and markets the Precise Motion Technology, a new type of mechanism. The technology creates high-efficiency transmissions and mechanisms components. The mechanisms have best-in-class features for robotics and motion control applications. They are also best-in-class for electric vehicles. The technology has unique capabilities for mechanisms. It offers more design flexibility than other types (eg: gears, cams, and linkages) and can solve problems that were not possible before. 21Geo's Center of Excellence helps customers adapt the technology to their specific needs.
technology_description: The Precise Motion Technology (PMT) takes as an input, the description of motion for two components to create a Motion Specialized Bearing (MSB). Multiple MSB's can be combined to create mechanisms. The technology takes as inputs the description of motion of two components (X, Y, and Rotation). A mathematical optimizer shapes the raceways to ensure the pins roll freely and the contact points on the pins oppose each other. The opposing contact points are carry-forward features from circular bearings. By opposing, a mispositioned pin does not jam. The sensitivity to manufacturing errors are minimized as well. The three input arrays (X, Y, and Rotation) comprise three independent degrees of freedom. That's more than any other type of mechanism. Linkages offer a discreet degree of freedom for each link. The resulting motion is an approximation where PMT offers exact motion. It's this freedom that makes PMT stand out. The transmissions are smaller, more durable, and quieter than gears. It's these features that will make 21Geo's transmissions the preferred drive for robotics and electric vehicles.
mit_connection: MIT alumni as founder | Thomas Dobroth '83 and '85 is the founder.
contact: dobroth@alum.mit.edu, dobroth@gmail.com, startupexchange-admin@mit.edu, startupexchange@mit.edu

name: 2PI Edit
elevator_pitch: 2Pi is a MIT spin-off developing nove optical technologies in sensing, imaging, navigation and beyond. The mission of the company is to create disruptive ultra-compact flat optics products to transform a variety of applications in consumer electronics, automotive, and industry applications, which are traditionally bulky, complicated and costly. Our team bring together in-depth experience in optical engineering, semiconductor production, nanofabrication, material science, and high-tech comme
description: High-performance miniaturized optical systems with wide field-of-view (FOV) and high-resolution are widely demanded in a variety of applications, such as 3-D optical sensing, imaging, LiDAR, virtual/augmented/mixed reality (AR/VR/MR) and so on. However, conventional optical solutions cannot keep up with the growing requirements as they are fundamentally limited by trade-offs among such key attributes, as well as the cost, and scalability of the optical systems. This challenge is further exaggerated in rapidly-growing markets requiring effective human-machine and machine-machine interactions in tight spaces.
technology_description: 2Pi develops advanced metasurface optics and optical engine products with unprecedented performance and compactness. Our patented flat optical technology uniquely offers a record extremely-wide FOV, high-resolution imaging or image projection, and an ultracompact device architecture. Enabled by this novel approach, we further develop innovative optical engines (e.g., 3-D sensors) for immersive experience, offering dramatically improved performance and reduced size, weight, power and cost (SWaP-C), tailored for consumer electronics, automotive, industrial automation, etc. When compared to state-of-the-art technologies, 2Pi’s meta-optics-enabled 3-D sensors feature a 2X extended FOV (up to 180°), 10X higher optical resolution (up to 9,000 × 9,000), significantly enhanced signal-to-noise ratios, and an ultra-compact form factor with a minimum element count (up to > 5X reduced module volume). Our versatile technology enables groundbreaking, highly-customizable optical solutions that meet the diverse and growing needs in the target market sectors.
mit_connection: MIT faculty as founder | MIT staff as founder | MIT alumni as founder | 2Pi Inc. is a startup company commercializing advanced optical technologies developed at MIT. We are discussion with MIT TLO for a license agreement. Co-founders: Juejun Hu (MIT faculty, DMSE), Tian Gu (MIT research scientist, MRL), Mikhail Shalaginov (MIT postdoc, DMSE).

name: 3D ARCHITECH Edit
elevator_pitch: 3D Architech revolutionizes metal manufacturing. We offer affordable (x100 lower cost than existing metal 3D printing), high-resolution (10 microns), carbon-neutral, and multi-material metal additive manufacturing, and outperforming 3D metal products. We first target the heatsink markets for data center cooling and expand to other industrial markets, including electric motor parts, fuel cells, water electrolysis, and medical devices.
description: We address fundamental metal manufacturing problems: manufacturable minimum feature size and the trade-off between part cost and production volume. Our gel-based metal additive manufacturing technology enables very fine-featured metal products with low part costs at any lot size. Our heatsink (3DA heatsink) with a fine-featured design can significantly improve thermal resistance and pressure drop for data center cooling.
technology_description: Our technology is gel-based metal manufacturing. We leverage the existing lithography-based 3D printing technologies to make metals. Our proprietary gel materials can be printed by any lithography-based 3D printer (SLA, DLP, LCD 3D printers), and our chemical process enables the conversion from gels to metals with the desired 3D structure. This method bypasses the fundamental metal manufacturing limitations and offers affordable (x100 lower cost than existing metal 3D printing), high-resolution (10 microns), carbon-neutral, and multi-material metal additive manufacturing.

name: 4M THERAPEUTICS Edit
elevator_pitch: 4M Therapeutics Inc. (4MTx) develops therapies for central nervous system (CNS) disorders with blockbuster potential. We focus on targets implicated in a wide array of disorders and indications. We apply unique insights from our living human brain cell platform, which was developed through a collaborative effort between Harvard, MIT, and the University of Washington) to identify and design more effective and safer therapeutics. Safety and efficacy data for our lead compound, 4MT2001, support
description: 4MTx is led by CEO Pablo Lapuerta, who has developed and obtained approval for multiple therapies. He introduced into clinical trials the first targeted CNS kinase inhibitor, achieving successful proof-of-concept. Board Chair Don Hayden, former President of Global Pharmaceuticals at Bristol Myers-Squibb, led the development and commercialization of the CNS blockbuster Abilify, with peak annual sales exceeding $6B. Board member Dr. Lawrence Goldstein, a co-founder of publicly-traded Cytokinetics, is professor emeritus at UC San Diego.
technology_description: New technology allows stem cells to be derived from adults and induced to become neural progenitor cells that show activities of live brain tissue. For example, neural progenitor cells derived from adults with bipolar disorder have deficiencies in the WNT pathway, which is involved in neuroplasticity and neurogenesis. The WNT pathway is also deficient in late-onset Alzheimer's disease and other conditions. 4MTx has used neural progenitor cell technology, high-throughput screening, and other efforts to develop small molecule WNT enhancers. 4MTx is utilizing induced pluripotent stem cells (iPSCs) to develop other small molecules. Our most advanced candidates are potent, specific, and cross the blood brain barrier, and they could potentially help people with a variety of psychiatric and neurological disorders.

name: ACTIVE SURFACES INC Edit
elevator_pitch: Active Surfaces envisions a future where any surface can be solar. Its proprietary, MIT-patented technology makes it possible to apply flexible, light-weight solar panels to any surface. Its technology is 10x lighter, has comparable efficiency and stability, and is competitive on an LCOE-basis.
description: Active Surfaces is commercializing an ultra thin-film solar technology based on decades of MIT research. Its technology can unlock terawatts of dual land-use, next-generation deployment. Solar power is considered critical for global decarbonization, but the deployment of solar panels is currently limited due to their large size, heavy weight, and high cost. Furthermore, traditional solar panels can only be deployed in specific environments due to their form factor and the significant logistical effort required to move them. Active Surfaces is trying to overcome these limitations by developing ultra-thin, lightweight, flexible solar panels that can be rolled out on any surface, expanding solar accessibility globally. This solution primarily targets individuals and organizations that want to harness solar power but face constraints due to the limitations of traditional solar panels.
technology_description: Active Surfaces envisions a future where any surface can be solar. Its proprietary, MIT-patented technology makes it possible to apply flexible, light-weight solar panels to any surface. Its technology is 10x lighter, has comparable efficiency and stability, and is competitive on an LCOE-basis. Active Surfaces' technology stands out because it allows for the development of solar panels that are as thin as paper, as efficient as traditional panels, and available at unprecedentedly low costs. It uses innovations from the field of materials science and manufacturing, developing solar panels that are thin, lightweight, durable, and flexible. They can be applied to any surface and transported in a roll, dramatically reducing installation costs. The company plans to manufacture its products in-house using a roll-to-roll manufacturing process, a first in semiconductor manufacturing, which traditionally has been used for items like labeling and tape. This roll-to-roll approach will allow for high-volume, low-cost production. The flexibility and lightness of the panels aim to expand the use cases to urban and other built environments, including commercial roofs, where the use of traditional heavy, rigid panels may not be feasible.

In doing so, we enable our customers to focus on their core business, empowering them to do their best work. We provide software and hardware to optimize spaces. We collect and analyze various types of data and send feedback to the relevant control systems. As a result, we are able to supply a variety of modules including desk booking and sensing and conference room booking and sensing. Adappt Intelligence acts as a bridge between people and the space they occupy. Adappt systems are constantly learning and improving the experience of the people within that space while providing significant cost savings to your company. The way Adappt works has changed. Workplaces lack the necessary tools to adapt. The gap between infrastructure and its occupants is widening. Adappt believes that spaces should enhance productivity, not detract from it. Spaces should empower people to do their best work. At Adappt we are building the central nervous system of a building, keeping a space active and alive around the people who occupy it. Adappt is proud to be innovating from our Boston headquarters to our Bangalore R&D center, combining the “brainpower” of MIT, one of the most innovative institutions in the world, with “jugaad” of Bangalore, the IT/start-up hub of India.

name: ADAPT AI Edit
elevator_pitch: Adapt builds tooling and infrastructure to build real-time AI apps. Realtime here refers to extremely low latency performance which is useful for cases like voice AI, AR/VR AI apps, multimodal agents, etc. We provide a client SDK and serverless deployment infrastructure to build multimodal AI pipelines for streaming data (audio/video/sensor input) quickly.
description: Building scalable AI applications on top of streaming input and output such as video, audio or time-series (ex: fitbit data) is extremely hard due to challenges associated with data processing, client-side support, latency, context window management, caching, chunking, etc. A new set of abstractions and infrastructure needs to be built to serve this growing need, and Adapt is making those building blocks.
technology_description: Adapt provides low-latency, universal infra for realtime AI. Our product inlcudes blend of webRTC and websocket network protocols to reduce latency combined with a serverless backend to minimize development time and cost, and maximize scalability. We are also building an open-source client library that can be used to create realtime apps on multiple devices, and a one line deployment experience.

name: ADAVIV Edit
elevator_pitch: Adaviv provides a cultivation productivity tool to growers of high-value crops and enables them to de-risk while improving, top and bottom lines via increased yield and quality, while also gaining labor and resource savings. The crop care software operates in greenhouses and indoor farms, providing early alerts of pests, diseases and stress and tracks plant growth for continual cultivation improvement over every crop cycle.
description: AdaViv is aiming to fundamentally change the way we grow crops in controlled-environments with the aid of sensing and computing technologies. We provide farmers with valuable insights on the health of their growing plants by capturing new types of high-throughput sensing data and using state-of-the-art analytics. Adaviv’s AI and vision-based sensing and software to provide frequent cultivation insights to improve the production of high-quality crops at scale. This is achieved by frequently tracking plant performance, identifying plant stress and abnormalities at the plant-level and uncovering hidden inefficiencies in the cultivation process to treat issues early with targeted and data-driven labor allocation. The goal is to provide a tool that helps cultivators build upon and execute their cultivation techniques and production to the highest degree by means of what we term a Lean Cultivation (TM) management system.
technology_description: We collect and combine sensory data with the power of AI to make precision farming accessible to growers of all sizes and easily scale their expertise and plant care. We are a hardware-enabled software company that builds mobile machine vision and environmental sensing systems and fuse these data to generate accurate AI-driven insights to detect plant health and stress at scales not possible with human eyes. Multispectral optical data is combined with environmental sensing and crop information to feed our deep learning models, while our customer-facing software translates the insights into task-specific recommendations, alerts and key performance indicators to continually improve the cultivation workflow and rapidly experiment.

name: ADVANCED MICRO SPRAYS Edit
elevator_pitch: Imagine materials that can be fine-tuned to repel or absorb other materials, enabling stronger, more efficient, and customizable materials solutions for applications. We have developed a groundbreaking spray technique using supercritical carbon dioxide to precisely deposit multiple nanomaterials at once onto surfaces. By creating microscopic patterns, we can control material properties like durability, conductivity, adhesion at unprecedented levels. This method, called supercritical-CO2 assisted atomization, produces tiny droplets that deliver the hybrid nanomaterials to surfaces, allowing for scalable, cost-effective manufacturing of nanostructured components. Unlike traditional methods, our approach focuses on creating and combining microscopic patterns, enabling the same material to achieve diverse properties and multifunctionality for advanced, high-performance applications. This innovation enables the synergistic enhancement of multiple functionalities, paving the way for advanced composites that improve energy systems, aerospace components, and everyday products. Our method has the potential to revolutionize manufacturing, boost the economy, and create innovative solutions that enhance lives.
description: Currently, manufacturing multifunctional coatings with concurrently maximized properties is challenging as increasing one property often reduces another or vice versa. Existing coating technologies often require harsh conditions of temperature or electrical gradients for application. These conditions severely limit the types of nanomaterials that can be applied as the process will often destroy them or, if the nanomaterial is not charged, will simply not work. Other coating techniques cause the nanoengineered materials to agglomerate, destroying their unique nanostructure and properties. Furthermore, depositing multiple nanomaterials to achieve multiple functionalities at once is challenging as most of nanomaterials are not adaptable with one another. This new coating technology, termed Supercritical CO2 Assisted Atomization (SAA), has been demonstrated with a variety of nanomaterials such as carbon nanotubes (CNT), graphene nanoplatelets (GNP), crystalline nanocellulose (CNC), boron nitride nanotubes (BNNT), silicon (Si), and lithium iron phosphate (LFP) on different substrates such as glass, aluminum and polymer (Kapton) to achieve multifunctional nanostructured surfaces.
technology_description: Supercritical Assisted Atomization is a spray process that produces thin coatings at few nanometers on a variety of substrates. The technique is based on taking a droplet from an aqueous (water) solution with suspended nanoparticles and then exploding the droplet, by the expansion of supercritical CO2 as it converts to gas. The droplets impact the surface and the nanoparticles self-assemble on the surface. The water solvent then evaporates leaving the nanoparticles from the droplet to then adhere to the substrate in a robust, patterned coating. To achieve multifunctionality, different nanoparticles are embedded in droplets by engineering the hydrophilicity/phobicity. Because nanoengineered materials with their high surface area and electrostatic charge are inherently sticky, these coatings have excellent adhesion to a wide variety of surfaces. The rate of deposition economically favors thin coatings with 10 nm precision. In comparison, thick films, measured in microns or thicker, typically use wet, slurry-based techniques.
mit_connection: MIT faculty as founder | A cofounder of Advanced Micro Sprays is Rudolf Schick, an MIT alumni.

At Advanced Potash Technology (APT), the vision is to supply the unserved demand of Potash fertilizers across the world with a disruptive technology, in a sustainable and environment-friendly manner, contributing to reduce undernourishment and poverty, further improving livelihood.
description: APT is a mining-meets-agriculture company that is aiming to deeply disrupt the ~$20bn global potassium fertilizer (potash). Whereas potash is currently produced from rare salt mines buried deep in the earth at disparate locations, APT has a cost-effective patented technology of making this nutrient available from potassium feldspars, a mineral type that makes up a sizeable percentage of the earth’s crust. Repeated experiments show double-digit yields increases given the characteristics of the product.

name: ADVANCED SILICON GROUP Edit
elevator_pitch: AASG is developing biosensors that could revolutionize protein testing & measurements. ASG’s low-cost silicon-based biosensors provide fast sensitive detection & measurement of proteins in solution. Initially targeting the detection of impurities in biopharma, ASG’s biosensors offer 10 X cost & time reduction over existing approaches & the ability to accurately measure many types of proteins in a single sample. When applied in biopharma manufacturing this will reduce costs, improve yields,
description: Advanced Silicon Group (ASG) is dedicated to making a positive impact on society through innovative biosensor technology. Our ASG Nanoswift™ biosensor, which is silicon-based and measures electrically rather than optically, offers a smaller form factor and is expected to be 15 times more cost-effective than traditional ELISA tests. Electrical measurements provide faster results, typically within 15 minutes, by detecting protein binding to antibodies. With a simple three-step process—expose the sensor to solution, rinse, and insert into the handheld testing system—our biosensor communicates with a computer to display protein concentrations. This silicon and electrical measurement innovation allows multiple small subsensors to be packed onto one chip, enabling a single biosensor to perform various protein tests. From advancing medical research to providing real-time health data, ASG is committed to using our expertise to create a better future for all.
technology_description: ASG’s patented biosensor works by combining known approaches to sensitizing silicon to organic biological molecules with photoelectric principles to create a highly sensitive quantitative measurement technique for specific analytes in solution. The device design allows for the detection of multiple analytes in the same test, including proteins, nucleic acids, and more. Nanowires have a high surface area-to-volume ratio, making them sensitive to their environment. This allows the measurement of dilute concentrations—pico-gram/ml detection is possible.

With this intuitive design, the physician can easily deflect the tip in both directions while staying focused on the fluoroscopy screen. The 1.5cm tip is designed to deflect bi-directionally up to 180 degrees. The distal and proximal marker bands allow physicians to see the deflection of the entire tip under fluoroscopy.

name: AILYZE Edit

description: AILYZE solves the problem of slow, manual, and inconsistent analysis of qualitative data (e.g., interview transcripts, reports, survey responses) across research-heavy roles. For example, market researchers struggle to synthesize thousands of open-ended survey responses quickly; product managers need faster insight from user interviews to inform roadmap decisions; UX/UI teams spend weeks manually tagging usability test feedback; and evaluators often face delays in coding and publishing findings due to manual thematic analysis. These users need a way to process large volumes of unstructured, multilingual text data accurately, quickly, and securely, without sacrificing depth or context.
technology_description: ILYZE sets itself apart by using fine-tuned open-source large language models (LLMs) specifically trained on qualitative research tasks like thematic coding, sentiment extraction, and pattern recognition. Unlike generic AI tools, our models understand the nuance and context required in academic and enterprise research. We also deploy a system of autonomous AI agents that collaboratively handle different stages of the analysis pipeline, from cleaning and segmenting raw data to identifying themes, surfacing trends, and generating visual insights. These agents simulate the roles of a research assistant, data analyst, and interviewer, all working in parallel to reduce analysis time from weeks to hours. Our tech stack ensures multilingual support, secure document processing, and interactive exploration via a conversational AI interface, giving users complete control over the depth and direction of analysis.

name: ALLONNIA Edit
elevator_pitch: Allonnia is an environmental biotechnology start-up committed to finding value-add biological solutions that integrate efficiently into existing operations AND have a net positive impact on the environment. They’re advancing mining technology through several major development platforms, one of which is Bio-Extract. This innovation is directly aligned with their mission to harness biological processes to tackle environmental and societal challenges – overall helping industry and nature work better together. The Bio-Extract platform is leveraging biotechnology to increase metal supply by capturing value from waste and eliminating impurities to boost supply. Currently at a TRL 5, we expect the solution to bring benefits including: reduce process timeframes with up to 20% increase in metal production; lower CAPEX requirement with a faster ROI; and turn waste into value driving ESG goals.
description: The global shift toward electrification is driving a massive demand for critical metals such as nickel, copper, lithium, and rare earth elements (REEs), essential for developing the infrastructure needed for renewable energy and electric vehicles. However, as ore grades for these metals decline, mining companies must extract and process larger quantities of material to meet this escalating demand. This presents significant environmental challenges, as mining operations currently contribute approximately 7% of global greenhouse gas emissions. The metals and mining industry is entering a new era, where the demand for materials embedded in low-carbon technologies is accelerating, as these technologies typically require more resources than their conventional counterparts. For example, battery electric vehicles (BEVs) tend to be 15 to 20 percent heavier than internal combustion engine (ICE) vehicles. Furthermore, the energy transition is shifting the materials demand profile, increasing the importance of materials such as nickel, lithium, copper and rare earth elements at the expense of fossil fuels. Rare earth elements (REEs) are essential for many critical electronic components and renewable energy production. However, their purification is complex and resource-intensive, making recovery challenging. The demand for these minerals will continue to rise as the world electrifies, decarbonizes, and advances in computing capabilities – reports show a demand increase from 220 MT in 2021 to 320 MT by 2026. Allonnia's technology addresses these challenges by providing a sustainable method for extracting REEs from wastewater, thereby reducing the environmental impact associated with traditional mining and processing methods. At the same time, this innovation supports the expansion of US REE production and contributes to meeting supply goals without exploiting virgin resources.
technology_description: Allonnia is developing a biological solution for the selective recovery of rare earth elements (REEs) and copper from water using specially designed metal-binding proteins attached to a solid support. REEs are challenging to recover due to their low concentrations and the presence of competing metals. Allonnia's innovative approach leverages the natural element-selective processes of metal-binding proteins to capture REEs even in the presence of high levels of interfering metals. By designing these proteins to function within a deployment system, Allonnia has created scalable technology for REE recovery at operational mining and manufacturing sites. The process allows wastewater to flow through the column, retaining REEs, which are then eluted at much higher concentrations with minimal interference from other cations.

Arbaclofen selectively activates GABA-B receptors to decrease presynaptic release of excitatory neurotransmitters while simultaneously decreasing excitability of the postsynaptic neuron. Increases in relative excitatory:inhibitory balance are commonly observed in humans with, and animal models of, autism spectrum disorders Arbaclofen treatment produces broad phenotypic improvements in animal models and humans. Arbaclofen significantly reduced irritable aberrant behavior in a Phase 3 trial in FXS. Excellent safety & tolerability confirmed in 360 humans with fragile X syndrome, including >200 subjects treated for over a year.

name: ALLTHENTICATE, INC. Edit
elevator_pitch: Allthenticate offers an easy-to-use mobile-based authentication technology to secure business’s physical and digital worlds, which is all managed in our cloud-based service.
description: Security doesn't have to be hard. At Allthenticate, we want to break the mold of security products by providing users with more security and less burden. Our product, Single Device Authentication (SDA), is designed to enable seamless authentication in both the physical and digital worlds by using our Smartphone App to replace keys and passwords, while unifying the management of these credentials into one easy-to-use interface.
technology_description: Our Technology, Single Device Authentication (SDA), works by creating a secure enclave on every device (i.e., phones, computers, and door locks) that can mutually authenticate each other. The credentials on the mobile devices leverage secure hardware (i.e., TrustZone and Secure Elements) to ensure that even nation station actors would struggle to compromise them. When the user wants to identify themselves, the request is forwarded to the phone where the user is shown a secure prompt to either approve or disapprove the requested action (e.g., unlock a door or login to a website). This enables each resource to implement different requirements, within the same ecosystem. For example, some doors can be configured to open automatically when an employee is near, while others may require the user to take out their phone and apply their fingerprint. Similarly, computers, websites, and internet services can be configured to require different levels of security, based on location, time, or action. We call these three levels: presence (automatically unlocking), intent (yes/no prompt), and identification (fingerprint or PIN). Because we use the same technology, SDA, in all of our products, we are able to quickly adapt to support new applications and grow with the rapidly changing information technology (IT) landscape.

name: ALMOND FINTECH Edit
elevator_pitch: Almond’s mission is to remove barriers between people and money through borderless financial technology.
description: Almond FinTech is setting the new standard of how money moves across borders. Using Almond's infrastructure, financial instituions around the world send and recevice funds with minimal loss and at the speed of the internet. Born out of MIT and Harvard, Almond's proprietary tech optimizes the routing for each transfer through multiple blockchains to identify the best path. The result is reliable, fast and affordable money transfers. The solution is equally applicable for foreign workers who send $100 to their families and businesses who pay $1M to a foreign supplier. Almond currently operates in 10+ countries in the Americas and APAC, and supports forex 40+ currency pairs.
technology_description: SETTLEMENT OPTIMIZATION ENGINE (SOE) Almond’s proprietary technology enables cross-chain multi-currency settlement using state-of-the-art data analytics and modeling. The SOE leverages multiple exchanges and blockchains to eliminate friction points while selecting the best intermediary digital currency through which to settle transactions on a second-to-second basis, optimizing for cost and speed. Cross-chain multi-currency exchange interoperability means no single point of failure and 24/7 availability (settlement complete, liquid and custodied by the financial institution). Unlike others using crypto and blockchain to settle cross-border transactions, Almond has no such dependency or single point of failure. Exchanges, currencies and blockchains are all used interchangeably. ALMOND TRANSFER PROTOCOL (ATP) Providing seamless interoperability across borders and between a range of financial institutions, including traditional banks, neobanks and digital wallets globally. Settles in and out of local fiat currency. Transactions and fees are executed in local fiat. FIs never hold crypto and their customers never touch or see crypto - solving for common regulator AML/transparency concerns.

name: ALPHABIOME.AI (FORMERLY METHA.AI) Edit
elevator_pitch: Alphabiome’s groundbreaking approach uses a proprietary advanced AI model to decode the secrets of the human microbiome, analyzing trillions of genetic fragments to identify high potential biomarkers at an unprecedented scale. The platform transforms untapped microbial genetic data into actionable insights for drug development, predicting the efficacy of treatments with remarkable accuracy. Alphabiome’s seasoned team includes MIT world-leading AI experts and Stanford biochemistry Nobel laure
description: Despite its vast biological significance, the current approach to microbiome analysis is limited to the 1% of microbes that have been identified and studied. Combining advanced AI and microbiome analytics, Alphabiome’s unique, data-driven approach leverages sophisticated novel mathematical models and algorithms to decode the genetic information of every microbe for the first time, including those previously unknown. Valuable biomarkers are then extracted to predict drug efficacy with unmatched accuracy, unlocking new possibilities for precision medicine. The proprietary AI technology was developed by Alphabiome’s CEO and founder Dr. Yaniv Altshuler, an MIT researcher and protégé of one of the world’s top data scientists MIT Prof. Alex Pentland. Working on AI for over twenty years, Altshuler has published three books, over seventy academic papers and twenty patents in the AI field. Altshuler focused on decentralized and scalable AI methods, which laid the groundwork for Alphabiome. In addition to MIT Prof. Pentland, the company’s cross-disciplinary scientific leadership includes Stanford Chemistry Nobel Laureates Prof. Roger Kornberg, renowned for his groundbreaking contributions to the field of genetics, and Prof. Michael Levitt, who contributed to revolutionizing the field of biochemistry and research into the structural basis of diseases.
technology_description: Alphabiome’s advanced AI platform can analyze unprecedented quantities of microbial data, including the untapped 99% of microbial genetic information, with groundbreaking accuracy. This enables us to identify valuable biomarkers at scale, powering a new era of AI-driven precision medicine and revolutionizing microbiome analysis. Alphabiome’s technology will improve drug efficacy by identifying the biomarkers that recommend the drugs with the best chance of success to be used for individual patients at a given time. Whilst other technologies and approaches are already identifying biomarkers, Alphabiome’s approach has a number of unique benefits 1) Unparalleled scale: State-of-the-art AI drug-matching models rely on just 5–200 biomarkers. Alphabiome’s model already uses 100,000+ biomarkers today and will scale to 1,000,000 markers by end of 2025. These numerous biomarkers present previously unimagined opportunities for medical discoveries 2) Unmatched accuracy: The analysis of vast and complex genetic datasets will empower pharmaceutical companies and researchers to predict treatment efficacy with improved precision, accelerating the development of personalized medicine and improving patient outcomes. 3) Technology scalable across diseases: Since our model detects patterns directly from genetic and microbiome data, validating one human use case (e.g., Crohn’s) proves its adaptability across multiple diseases.

name: ALPHAGUARDIAN Edit
elevator_pitch: AlphaGuardian Networks protects the Industrial Internet of Things (IIoT). Using its patented secure management appliances connected to its AI cloud, AlphaGuardian provides both device security as well as enhanced AI efficiency management for those devices.
description: IIoT devices include all power, cooling, heating and related systems within buildings and mission critical facilities, such as data centers, laboratories and factories. The communications used in these systems are universally legacy in nature and have numerous cyber vulnerabilities. In addition, traditional central management systems such as Building Management Systems have a 1-to-many polling topology and must consequently poll devices for their data in slow polling cycles. This polling creates both cybersecurity problems with vulnerable communications and poor management decisions based on low-granularity data. AlphaGuardian solves these problems by securing IIoT systems with locally-based secure management appliances and a cloud-based AI system which discovers otherwise unknown system anomalies.
technology_description: AlphaGuardian's secure management appliances support up to 5 IIoT devices. These devices have 2 Ethernet ports, one for gathering data within their secure internal network connection to each IIoT devices, and one for encrypted push communications to the AlphaGuardian AI cloud. The secure management appliances serve as Zener Data Diodes which, in normal operation, push information unidirectionally via a secured-link to the AI cloud. In the event that a user who has been authenticated via 2 Factor Authentication wishes to issue a command to a device being protected by a Data Diode, they make an appropriate request within the cloud and then the next connection from the Data Diode to the cloud is reversed in a Zener effect and the information is sent back to the Diode for execution on an IIoT device. Because of their proximity and distribution, the Data Diodes are able to gather 95% or more data than would be otherwise accumulated by a traditional building management system or other facilities monitoring system. This allows a large amount of valuable analytics to be calculated with respect to each device, enabling the normal operating parameters to be learned by the system and allowing early detection of system anomalies. Along with early detection, the system's ability to flag only statistically significant events as alarm events, actually prevents nuisance alarms. Nuisance alarms have become such a problem in the process-control industry that ISA and ANSI combined for the 18.2 Alarm Management Standard in an effort to reduce dangerous and wasteful nuisance alarms in the industry. Only AlphaGuardian's patented system can provide statistical evidence of its ability to reduce nuisance alarms while still providing alarms for any statistically significant event.

description: The high-performance end of the battery market is currently dominated by lithium-ion technology, however, battery pack prices have increased as much as 47% since 2021. As such, EVs are now constrained to the premium and luxury end of the market, and stationary storage and maritime integrators are struggling to find safe, affordable alternatives. The raw material supply chain is confined to unfriendly countries, which increases pricing volatility. Safer, lower-cost, lower-performance non-lithium options are available, largely targeting utility-scale long-duration storage solutions. These technologies are often large and bulky with low discharge rates, making them unusable for automotive and maritime applications.
technology_description: Our new battery chemistry is the only high-performance offering that’s low-cost, non-flammable, and non-toxic. With no lithium, no cobalt, and no organic solvents, Alsym batteries offer the promise of clean, affordable storage for everyone—without the need for subsidies.

name: AMALIE BEAUTY / WINK NATURAL COSMETICS Edit
elevator_pitch: Wink Natural Cosmetics is enhancing natural beauty through our all-natural restorative lash, brow and eye care products. Created by nature, tested by science.
description: Eyelash extensions are all the rage -- and understandably -- who wouldn't want the problem of "its so annoying, my lashes are so long they brush my glasses" *flips hair*? Well, then again, the upkeep is annoying.. and expensive. Then we realized, its not only expensive, annoying and occasionally embarrassing (you know, between fills?..eek) but it's also dangerous. If your aesthetician doesn't apply the lashes correctly, you can grow fungus thanks to that insoluble eyelash extension glue. Yeah--talk about gross. So we tried a slew of other products on the market to achieve that same lashes-to-the-glasses effect, but guess what? Lash growth products are expensive. More importantly--most of them don't even work. Well, for us, none of them worked. So we put our heads together and started researching what makes those lashes grow anyway. We wanted an all-natural formula so that we wouldn't be afraid to test it on ourselves. A few iterations later, we had a product. We tested the product and got great results. What was interesting to us, though, was that while 4 out of 5 of the participants had lashes that were 10-20% longer, 100% of them really experienced fuller lashes. A common complaint from our competitors' users was that their lashes grew longer but they still had sparse lashes. We decided to try the stuff out on our eyebrows too because, hey, we were still paying for our twelve year-old selves' mistakes (when we went loose with the tweezers? Where were our moms..) All in all, we had developed a hypoallergenic formula that: a). was made with the finest all natural ingredients, b). could make your eyelashes longer, c). could grow more lashes and d). could regrow your eyebrows. Sounds pretty cool to us. So instead of keeping this cool secret to ourselves and our friends, we decided to share it with you. We bring to you: Wink.

name: AMERICAN BORONITE CORPORATION Edit
elevator_pitch: Boronite has developed a proprietary technology for the manufacture of Boron Nitride Nanotubes (BNNTs) in continuous yarn and tape formats, and is building industrial-scale manufacturing capabilities for these materials.
description: Boronite is an advanced materials manufacturing startup focused on producing boron nitride nanotube (BNNT)-based continuous yarn and tapes in industrial quantities. BNNTs are similar in structure to carbon nanotubes (CNTs) and share their exceptional strength characteristics, but also have some important differences and advantages. Unlike CNTs, BNNTs retain their strength at much higher temperatures (900°C), are electrical insulators while retaining excellent heat conductivity, and exhibit piezoelectric and radiation absorbing qualities. Boronite aims to take advantage of these properties to develop applications in a variety of areas: structural health monitoring, structural reinforcement, structural composites, shielding of electrical conductors, ballistic protection, thermal management, radiation protection, actuation, and multifunctional combinations of the above.

elevator_pitch: Amplified Industries (formerly called Acoustic Wells) is an award-winning team with a blend of deep industry expertise and exceptional technical capabilities. Recipients of an NSF I-Corps grant, the 1st prize of the NE CleanTech Open, MIT $100K Entrepreneurship Competition, and ASU Innovation Open (IoT); also featured in Forbes’s 2020 30-under-30 list in Energy. The team is developing a novel pumping control solution for oil wells. The solution is plug&play, affordable and scalable. This is ma
description: The Acoustic Wells team is developing a novel pumping control solution for oil fields. The approach leverages a novel sensor and cutting edge control and AI algorithms to maximize the efficiency of a complete oil field. The solution will be plug&play, affordable and scalable. This is made possible by using sensors we developed and patented at MIT which infer the state of the pump deep underground using signals at the surface of the well. The simplicity of the sensors allows us to effortlessly and affordably instrument a complete oil parcel. We then feed that information to our AI algorithms to automatically control each well to allow every producer to pump more oil with a significantly reduced power consumption and maintenance costs. In addition we can actively detect and minimize methane leaks on the well. By taking a holistic approach and instrumenting a complete field, we are able to provide a unique value to the user and bring savings unheard of before.
technology_description: Amplified Wells has been used across a huge range of operator and asset types all across the US with consistent and repeatable results. See how our solution works in the real world and how we can help revolutionize your operations.

name: ANGIEX, INC. Edit
elevator_pitch: Angiex is a Peter Thiel-funded, LabCentral-based biotech startup with a novel approach to cancer therapy: an antibody-drug conjugate targeting the dual tumor cell and tumor endothelial antigen TM4SF1. Angiex ADCs achieve long-lasting (> 3 month) regressions of a wide variety of mouse tumors with single dose treatments, and have a broad therapeutic window. Angiex is currently finalizing its clinical agent and plans to reach proof of concept in humans in 2021.
description: Angiex is developing antibody-based therapeutics against a novel target, TM4SF1 (Transmembrane-4 L Six Family member 1). TM4SF1 is a membrane glycoprotein of tetraspanin topology that was originally discovered as a protein expressed on many human epithelial tumor cells. In tumor cells, TM4SF1 supports growth, invasion, and metastasis. Angiex founders Hal Dvorak and Shou-Ching Jaminet identified TM4SF1 as an endothelial cell biomarker with critical roles in support of angiogenesis, thereby establishing TM4SF1 as a dual (tumor vessel and tumor cell) therapeutic target in cancer. TM4SF1 clusters in cell surface microdomains and internalizes, making it a candidate target of antibody-drug conjugate therapy. The potential of anti-TM4SF1 antibody-drug conjugates (ADCs) was tested in a preclinical collaboration between Pfizer and Angiex founders at Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center. Anti-TM4SF1 ADCs effectively regressed xenograft tumors in mice. An improved anti-TM4SF1 ADC would have potential to effectively treat all solid tumors. Creating such an agent is Angiex’s mission.

description: Antora Energy is developing an extremely inexpensive thermal energy storage system. With a marginal cost of energy capacity of < $10/kWh, our thermal battery will take excess electricity from wind and solar power plants, store it for hours or days, and deliver it back to consumers when needed. By storing energy as heat in extremely inexpensive raw materials and converting that heat back to electricity with a high-efficiency thermophotovoltaic heat engine, our energy storage system costs are low enough to make intermittent renewable energy, plus storage, cost-competitive with fossil fuels. Inexpensive energy storage will enable the widespread deployment of wind and solar energy, thus ensuring cheap, sustainable, and reliable electricity on a global scale while dramatically reducing carbon emissions.

name: APERTURE SPACE Edit
elevator_pitch: Aperture Space is an early stage start-up developing a novel satellite payload and machine learning analytics platform to commoditize radar imagery for geospatial analysts and provide actionable insights to downstream industry customers. The payload is highly sensitive to measures relevant to many large industries including agriculture, forestry, water utilities, mining, etc. This data helps them make decisions about their natural resources, actions and risk. Today, all commercial radar satellites operate at a single frequency mostly used for intelligence and reconnaissance. Non-defense satellite radar users rely exclusively on civil satellites which leads to inflexible timing, delivery and pricing straining their business models. Aperture Space will offer novel commercial radar imagery with flexible pricing, satellite tasking and data delivery to alleviate these issues and accelerate the transition from civil satellite platforms.
description: Commercial Analytics Companies convert satellite imagery into actionable insights for their customers. However, the data that drives their product is sourced almost exclusively from civil satellites developed by government space agencies for national research and intelligence purposes. Those organizations make data publicly available for good will, but do not have an incentive to tailor their products towards commercial industry needs. Commercial Analytics Companies struggle with inflexible pricing, tasking and delivery which disincentivizes experimentation and limits applications to those that can bear high costs. Additionally, inflexible satellite tasking and data delivery add additional cost and inconvenience to those companies. Aperture Space will deliver high quality data with a modern pricing model, flexible tasking and data delivery allowing Commercial Analytics Companies to increase profit and expand their businesses.
technology_description: Aperture Space is developing a lightweight antenna and radar satellite payload to commoditize long-wavelength synthetic aperture radar. Advancements will reduce satellite mass, volume and ultimately cost while maintaining traditional performance and flexibility. The satellite will include other capabilities such as edge processing to commoditize satellite radar imagery. Once data is received, it will be fused with other data streams like multispectral imagery and processed by deep neural networks to extract customer specific actionable insights.

elevator_pitch: Arctura's (formerly called Aquanis) mission is to secure a sustainable energy future that is affordable, healthy, and accessible. Through technology innovation, we are developing new wind energy solutions to get more from every turn.
description: Arctura (formerly called Aquanis) is developing an advanced active flow control system that reduces the cost of wind energy by making wind turbines more efficient and durable. Arctura's software-controlled, solid-state actuators modify the air flow over the turbine blades on demand, enabling them to instantly react to changes in the wind, diminishing unwanted aerodynamic forces before they develop. This allows utility-scale turbines to be built with less material while extending their service life, and will be a key to the development of next generation’s ultra-large turbines of 15MW or more.
technology_description: Arctura’s novel blade coating improves the performance of all standard lightning protection systems on wind turbine blades. Every year, the industry loses hundreds of millions of dollars to lightning strikes. Our new blade coating technology reduces lightning-induced damage to wind turbine blades and costly downtime by guiding the energy of the strike to the lightning receptors and preventing blade punctures.

name: ARMOIRE Edit
elevator_pitch: Armoire is pioneering ‘wardrobe-as-a-service’. They offer their customer an endless stream of high-end clothes to rent, which Armoire personalizes to her style and fit preferences using machine learning algorithms. With door-to-door pickup and delivery on her schedule, Armoire conveniently provides the quality and variety of clothing that her busy life demands for less than the price of her gym membership.
description: Fast fashion produces clothing through energy-intensive processes that require large amount of crude oil and pesticides, which release dangerous emissions. Each American throws away more than 68 pounds of clothing annually, representing 4% of municipal solid waste. Moreover, large fashion conglomerates have pushed out local clothing artisans and producers around the world. These entrepreneurs are often breadwinners for their families, and represent an important sector of local economies; our platform will provide a spotlight on their traditional and cultural techniques. The average American woman with a household income of $150K spends approximately $2,600 annually on her wardrobe. However, a woman regularly wears only 20% of the items she owns and many of the clothing pieces purchased each year end up unused, donated or part of our waste system. Through clothing rental, we are looking to increase the environmental sustainability of clothing by moving away from fast fashion to a shared asset model, enabling us to all live more simply with less. Every month, a customer will receive a “box” of items that have been selected for her unique style. For inventory, Armoire will build out a network of environmentally sustainable local designers, who are looking to reach a broader market of high-end customers. Armoire commits to sustainable model through environmentally safe dry cleaning, re-usable shipping boxes, and recycling of clothing at the end of their lifecycle.

LiquiGlide Inc. is a Cambridge, MA-based company, founded and led by MIT scientist and successful entrepreneurs. name: ARRAY INSIGHTS (FORMERLY SECURE AI LABS/SAIL) Edit
elevator_pitch: New data regulations and security threats force companies to silo their data, hurting industry research and innovation. We use a new CPU feature called an "enclave" to encrypt data during its analysis, allowing companies to control how their data is used and by whom, similar to DRM for renting movies. Unfortunately, these enclaves have limited capability, so we built and patented the use of a VM capable of any computation to manage the decentralized control and analysis of remote data silos.
description: Secure AI Labs is an AI Platform company providing a High-Assurance Federated Learning solution for healthcare. Its products are used by Pharmaceutical and Medical Device companies, Academic Medical Centers, and Research Consortiums to enable Machine Learning and analytics across data sources without aggregating data. Using hardware-based confidential computing platform as its core, SAIL’s defense-in-depth architecture ensures patient data are strongly protected, making it a suitable solution for the enterprise. Secure AI Labs (SAIL) was founded by researchers and professors from MIT, and is headquartered in Cambridge, MA. Since its founding, SAIL has done successful proofs of concept in bioinformatics and they’re set to start pilots with major hospitals and consulting companies in late summer of this year. Recent Announcement: Kidney Cancer Association Uses Secure AI Labs to Fast-track Cancer Research with Federated Learning https://healthtechhotspot.com/using-federated-learning-to-fast-track-cancer-research/
technology_description: SAIL’s platform creates a single access point for multiple sources of data (sources focused on one disease as well as sources across complementary endpoints) Without SAIL’s High-Assurance Federated Learning it would be nearly impossible to manually manage competing data use agreements across so many hospitals, biobanks, and diseases. To use the data, researchers use SAIL’s SAFE function library to run federated algorithms on the data, and protect it on-prem of the hospital infrastructure. DRM via AMD’s SEV SNP enclaves automatically manage data authorization, use, and deletion according to data use agreements (translated into digital contracts). Hardware-assured auditing via enclaves also produces forensic-level auditing for versioning data automatically when patients opt out of studies, notifying IRB’s of change quickly, and recording all for regulatory submission.

name: ARTIFICIAL AXON LABS Edit
elevator_pitch: Today we have no cures for devastating neurodegenerative diseases such as multiple sclerosis. Because of the lack of predictive tools to model these diseases successful drug candidates in pre-clinical studies often fail in the clinic. Imagine that we could create brain tissue mimics to correctly model human disease, greatly increasing the chances of finding cures for neurodegeneration. We achieved this by developing a powerful platform technology that uses state-of-the-art 3D-printing and
description: Current in vitro tools fail to correctly model human myelination and neurodegeneration. Our Artificial Axons platform delivers critical advantages, which make it a superior platform for drug discovery for neurodegeneration. (i) It is the only platform that enables direct readout and fast quantification of 3D myelination around axon mimics, in 3D-printed brain-like microenvironments. (ii) It is currently the only platform capable of high throughput drug screening for pro-myelinating compounds using patient-derived human cells, allowing us to directly address human disease and bypass inaccurate animal models. (iii) Unmatched by any of today available tools, our platform rapidly and reproducibly prints fully customizable in vitro human brain environments at scales required in pharmaceutical industries, with tunable geometry and previously unmatched very low mechanical stiffness of nervous tissue, to recapitulate various disease states of nervous system.
technology_description: 3D printing technologies (3DP) have emerged as a potent and versatile tool to deliver these prospects; 3D-printed models of cardiac, muscle and bone tissues and organs-on-the-chip technology have been successfully used in modeling related diseases in the lab. However, current limitations of 3DP and other biomanufacturing techniques prevent scalable production of such models required in biotech and pharmaceutical industries. Moreover, current 3DP cannot afford fabrication of tissue models that require very low mechanical stiffness (< 100 kPa) and close to one micrometer-scale features, such as nervous tissue. Our technology will deliver scalable tools that credibly mimic nervous tissue that will transform the development of therapies for neurodegenerative disease. Toward this goal, we have been developing Artificial Axons, a platform technology to fabricate synthetic axon mimics with the mechanical properties and geometry matching biological axons. To reach commercial readiness we are advancing our technology in several areas including 1) Scalable and reproducible manufacturing of Artificial Axons. This ultimate challenge of 3D-printing of the micrometer diameter fibers with ultra-soft materials that match characteristics of biological axons, in the multi-well plates compatible with pharmaceutical industry setups, with high throughput (minutes per 96-well plate) and minimal variability from well to well will require the development of novel optical hardware solutions and system automation; 2) Development and optimization of the 3D-printable materials. To fabricate Artificial Axons, we have developed a novel propriety class of biocompatible materials with tunable stiffness. However, some cytotoxic components of these materials require a long washing process that slows the production of axon devices. We plan to develop fully biocompatible 3D-printable materials using FDA-approved components, which will not require laborious washing steps; 3) Expand 3D printing capabilities to create any desired features with tunable geometry and mechanical properties, to provide unmatched technology to create models for any disease.

name: ARTIFICIO Edit
elevator_pitch: We are developing the next-generation of machine vision models that "see" like a human, while reverse-engineering the human visual system in the process. The purpose of Artificio is to: [1] design the next generation of machine vision systems that can 'see' like a human by reverse-engineering visual computations of biological organisms at the representational level via insights from computational models, psychophysics, and neural recordings; and [2] in doing so develop new technologies that may enhance visual capabilities of humans & treat visual diseases such as visual agnosia & prosopagnosia. To accomplish this, we propose 3 main Research directions as the pillars for the study at Artificio that span the fields of vision science, computer vision, machine learning and robotics. The technologies discovered from our research will lead to new Developments in improving vision for humans & machines, that will results in robust reverse-image search, new autonomous driving API technologies, new state-of-the-art radiology screening detection systems, and treatments and diagnosis of visual processing disorders in humans.
description: Visual Intelligence
technology_description: We have developed brain-aligned machine vision models, where our simulated systems "see" like humans. We have experimentally validated our approaches and the systems' we've created have succeeded at modelling primate visual cortex activations from neuro-physiological data.

name: ASSAYQUANT TECHNOLOGIES, INC. Edit
elevator_pitch: AssayQuant Technologies is a Life Science company founded by scientists that develops innovative enzyme assay formats for a quantum improvement in performance and productivity to accelerate discovery and drug development.
description: AssayQuant Technologies is a private company founded by scientists with a commitment to developing innovative enzyme assay formats that are easy to use, highly quantitative and provide a quantum improvement in performance and productivity. We apply rigorous development, validation and manufacturing practices to create products that deliver exceptional value (easier, faster, better, cheaper) that will be backed by outstanding customer support. Initial focus is to develop innovative strategies for directly measuring the activity of protein kinases, which transfer a phosphate group from ATP to serine, threonine or tyrosine residues within protein or peptide substrates. There are over 500 protein kinases and this group of enzymes is intensely studied since dysregulation of kinase activities lies at the center of many human diseases. Therefore, generation of protein kinase inhibitors and the need to accurately measure kinase activities in basic research, drug development and diagnostic applications is an active area that spans many markets including pharmaceutical, biotechnology, diagnostic and contract research companies, academic and Government institutions. Indeed, >30% of all drug development efforts currently are focused on protein kinases. Over 30 drugs have been approved by the FDA, however, these are predominately ATP-competitive inhibitors, which have several disadvantages that reduce their efficacy. More recently, there has been a surge in the generation of non-ATP-competitive kinase inhibitors, with an increased need for better assay tools to effectively characterize their mechanism of action and drive decisions earlier in the drug development process.

name: ASSIST.AI Edit
elevator_pitch: We are creating machine vision-based augmented reality mobile assistants for the exploding consumer hobbyist craft segment - knitters, crocheters, etc. Over the last decade, consumers have shifted away from physical goods and towards hobbies and experiences, turning crafts int a $168 bn market with hundreds of millions of consumers, each spending thousands of dollars a year. Digital disruption, however, has not kept up – the $30 bn knitting market, for example, has only 3 “tech” companies, all of them offering only basic services like digital project repositories. At the same time, physical crafts are filled with “eye-tedious” components, like counting hundreds of stitches, measuring your gauge, or spotting 1 error in 1,000. We are using Machine Vision to automate those painful, manual use cases across hobbyist crafts, becoming the digital assistant for crafters.
description: The brand is built upon the coexistence of dichotomies: everyday and fantasy, tradition and innovation, design and versatility -- creating an elevated experience that defies trade-offs. Senreve believes women are multifaceted and can have it all -- no compromise necessary. Senreve was born when, as rising female professionals, we found ourselves in search of the perfect luxury handbag. The company was seeking something that was beautiful and feminine, but also versatile enough to keep up with our everyday lives. However, Senreve discovered most designer bags didn’t fully consider all of these needs, so we decided to take matters into their own hands. With Senreve, women are now free to go about their day with ease, empowered to better live their busy, modern lifestyles. From phone and wallet to laptop and lipstick -- finally a beautiful bag that knows how to multitask. What Senreve has created is a seamless blend of elegant design, impeccable quality and innovative construction. The bags are sleek, structured and designed to carry your life in style. They're also lightweight, travel-friendly and just as appropriate for a business meeting as they are for happy hour or brunch. Bags are made from 100% genuine Italian leather with a pebbled finish. Each bag is expertly handcrafted to look and feel soft and supple, structured yet lightweight, and durable and water-resistant. We’ve also invested heavily in a top quality micro-suede lining that most other brands deem too expensive to use. For us, a top-quality product begins with exceptional ingredients. Craftsmen constructing SENREVE bags today have worked with top luxury brands for over 50 years. They employ a difficult inside-out technique that only a few factories in the world are able to do. Senreve believes combining this master craftsmanship with design and innovation sets SENREVE apart as the future of luxury.
technology_description: We are using Deep Neural Networks for Object Recognition to track and identify features that are important to different crafts, starting with knitting, where we are training our algorithms to identify individual stitches (for counting, gauge, pattern tracking, etc.). We have already collected over 20,000 training images from the community, containing over 800,000 individual stitch objects.

name: ATOME INC Edit
elevator_pitch: AtoMe develops advanced metal powders targeted at 3D printing. By reinforcing powders with ceramic nanomaterials, we achieve improved printability and the capability to better tailor material properties for extreme environments such as high temperatures and radiation. AtoMe aims to market these materials as an enabling technology for next-generation energy production, improving the feasibility of experimental technology like fusion power plants and enhancing fuel efficiency in major industries s
description: The current global push for cleaner energy has driven significant progress in the design of advanced power generation methods, but these designs are almost universally held back by a lack of structural materials that can feasibly survive under the harsh conditions required for success. Capability to operate under higher temperatures would enable major industries such as aviation, oil/gas, and nuclear fission to achieve improved fuel efficiency and decrease their costs and environmental impacts. It will also be absolutely essential for more advanced experimental designs, such as nuclear fusion, to achieve any level of success at all. Typical alloy design is too slow of a process with too limited returns to achieve the rapid improvements necessary. Our approach offers an alternative, improving upon the properties of the existing best-in-class materials in a way that is uniquely scalable and customizable.
technology_description: AtoMe is developing enhanced powders for metal 3D printing processes by incorporating ceramic nanomaterials to form new composites. These composites have been demonstrated to achieve significant improvements in the upper temperature limits of materials, in some cases raising the potential working temperatures by as much as 100C. Our materials have also demonstrated significantly improved printability, decreasing cracking and pore formation during the printing process that has long hindered widespread adoption of 3D printing. Use of these powders in a 3D printing process provides higher quality components, and our method of ceramic reinforcement presents a new point of tunability that can be quickly adjusted to target specific properties.

name: AUGMENTA BIOWORKS Edit
elevator_pitch: What if instead of spreading disease, we spread immunity to disease? Augmenta Bioworks is a technology focused pharmaceutical discovery operation. We focus on diseases that could be cured or prevented through immune augmentation. For example, by looking at the fraction of patients that respond to immune oncology treatments, maybe we can make drugs that cure non-responders. We have had success in our approach across a wide range of disease areas, including infectious disease, oncology and a
description: Augmenta Bioworks discovers new therapeutics by harnessing the most powerful force in the fight against disease: natural human immunity. The technology pinpoints the protective immune response of individuals and translates discoveries into therapies.
technology_description: Our core assay technology, SingleCyte, is what we use to identify high value antibodies. At its core the SingeCyte assay is cell sorting for secreted proteins. In brief, we have engineered a surface of encoded antigens that serves as a substrate for the assay. Protein secreting cells, such as the plasma cells that produce antibodies, are overlaid on the surface. Cells secreting target specific antibodies generate a signature reaction-diffusion pattern. The signal is read out from an automated microscope, with images analyzed by an AI engine that determines which cells meet selection criteria. An automated single cell retrieval device grabs the target cells and places them into a microwell plate for sequencing. We can assay millions of cells per day per instrument and pick a thousand high value hits, all for the marginal costs of plastic and chemicals. On top of our core assay technologies, we've built a complete end to end discovery platform, integrating SOP's, 200,000 lines of code, and extensive automation, to go from patient samples to milligram quantities of test product. We also we have several assets in various stages of manufacturing and pre-clinical development.

name: AURABLUE Edit
elevator_pitch: We all know how sleep deprivation can impair our productivity, relationships, and day-to-day functioning. For many women, menopause takes this sleep deprivation to the next level. Almost all women will be regularly woken up from hot flashes. These disruptions can occur a dozen times a night, leaving them with only a couple hours of sleep nightly for up to 10 years. AuraBlue is a smart mattress topper that enables women to sleep peacefully through the night, detecting hot flashes and preemptively
description: Catalia Health brings together artificial intelligence, psychology, and medicine to deliver lasting change. They create effective patient engagement and generate unique data of value to customers. The cloud-based platform delivers unique conversations to patients to help address their ongoing healthcare issues in an effective way. These messages are delivered through mobile apps, a web interface, and the uniquely engaging (and patented) interactive robotic coach. Customers are healthcare companies who are searching for effective behavior change solutions, including pharmaceutical manufacturers and distributors, home health agencies, and healthcare providers.
technology_description: AuraBlue is a 3-part product that includes a wearable sensor bracelet, a main cooling hub, and a liquid-cooled mattress pad. AuraBlue’s wireless sensor wristband features a skin conductivity sensor, heart rate monitor, oxygen saturation meter, and an accelerometer packaged inside of a durable and comfortable housing. These sensors not only allow us to predict hot flashes, but also allow for sleep stage tracking, and quantitative sleep quality comparisons. The main hub lies at the center of our product’s architecture and connects the subsystems. It utilizes a phase change refrigeration system similar to what you would find in an air conditioner to provide more than 150% greater cooling capability than our thermoelectric liquid cooling competitors. Also, the main hub optionally communicates data to a user’s phone in order to provide additional feedback on their hot flashes and trends over time. The mattress pad is made up of thermoplastic polyurethane infused nylon sheeting that is heat sealed to form a tough and durable heat exchanger interfacing directly with the user in order to extract heat away from their body when necessary. This material and manufacturing process is commonly used in inflatable boats and other waterproof flexible applications. It’s topped by a layer that’s both thermally conductive and breathable for maximum cooling and comfort. Unlike many products, AuraBlue is not static and utilizes the data it gathers each night to improve, continuing to offer increased personalization and relief throughout its lifetime. This individual personalization coupled with our ability to push new updates to the system remotely, allow AuraBlue to deliver the highest quality sleep assistance possible to every unique user.

name: AUTONOMOUS CYBER Edit
elevator_pitch: We're building an AI model that is capable of autonomously hacking computers and applications given simple, English language instruction. We will integrate this product into the software development lifecycle so developers can continuously assess the security of the applications they're deploying.
description: Cybersecurity is hard. Developers lack the cybersecurity knowledge needed to validate the security of their applications, and automated tools can't emulate sophisticated attacks. We encode expert cybersecurity knowledge in a large language model to empower developers with that knowledge.
technology_description: Our model leverages recent advances in generative AI to take complex sequences of actions that cannot be feasibly hardcoded. The existing cybersecurity automation products on the market today do just that--they run a preprogrammed series of checks and find the same results each time. Our model, entirely based on research published within the last 12 months and backbone models more recently than that, mimics the actions of a sophisticated adversary, not a script.

description: Axoft, a startup that grew out of research in the lab of Jia Liu at Harvard University, has created an entirely new class of brain implants that are >10,000x softer than plastics and >1,000,000x softer than the silicon used in current brain implants.
