technology_description: Scams have evolved and have become visually rich. Example: YouTube shorts showing fraudulent customer service numbers. Compared to our competitors, we have developed technology that can process visual content (shorts, videos, posts, etc.). Specifically, we use deep learning models, such as visual similarity based on triplet network models. Our technology finds visual scams, extracts fraud-related information, and notifies our customers. Our customers reported finding 50% more scams using Eydle’s technology.

name: FABRI Edit
elevator_pitch: Fabri is a Pre-seed company developing on-demand manufacturing processes for precision metal parts. Our technology can produce parts as big as a car or as small as a fly within days instead of the industry standard lead times of 18-26 months for investment castings. We save our customers money on labor costs by consolidating assemblies, eliminating tooling, and digitizing their inventory.
description: The US' industrial base cannot supply critical castings and forgings to its domestic industries. Up to multi-year lead times have resulted in about 50% of military aircraft, submarines, and other systems being grounded for maintenance. This extends beyond the military, with other domestic industries struggling to compete on cost in the face of labor and supply chain shortages. With systems becoming increasingly complex, the cost and availability of labor is a major constraint to being able to assemble and manufacture products domestically. New manufacturing processes are needed to increase the productivity of the workforce and consolidate complex assemblies into efficient monolithic parts.
technology_description: Fabri is developing an automated and digitized manufacturing process to dramatically increase the productivity of the castings and forgings industry by eliminating tooling. Fabri replaces tooling with on-demand digital fabrication of sacrificial tooling through a proprietary stereolithography process, and using materials specifically made for our process. An automation software layer can automatically take orders from our customers, add the required tooling to a manufacturing queue, and produce the parts through an automated manufacturing line that ensures each worker can manage many machines. We keep all of this technology in-house rather than selling it to produce a vertically-integrated and tightly controlled factory that we can continuously improve.

name: FELICITEX THERAPEUTICS, INC. Edit
elevator_pitch: Felicitex Therapeutics is a drug discovery company developing treatments and diagnostic assays to improve the effectiveness and long-term outcomes of treatments for the deadliest and most therapy resistant cancers: pancreatic, colorectal, non-small cell lung, and ovarian.
description: Felicitex Therapeutics is a drug discovery company at the forefront of one of the most promising areas in oncology – quiescent (sleeping) cancer cells. We are developing treatments and diagnostic assays to improve the effectiveness and long-term outcomes of treatments for the deadliest and most therapy resistant cancers: pancreatic, colorectal, non-small cell lung, and ovarian. Recently, it has become accepted in the scientific community that populations of malignant cells are not homogenous, they have hierarchy. Some of the cancer cells divide rapidly but some do not, some of the cancer cells are sleeping. They are in the quiescent state. This is especially true of solid tumors in which the cells in the outer layers are proliferating, but the inner volume comprises a large proportion of quiescent cells, frequently as a result of inadequate nutrient supply and oxygen deprivation (hypoxia). Hypoxic regions have long been known to be resistant to chemotherapy and radiation treatment. Tumor hypoxia, as a target for chemotherapy, is currently an active area of research. Moreover, when cancer cells are under stress from either chemotherapy, anti-angiogenesis therapy, specific targeted treatment, or radiation, cancer cells often go to “sleep”, or use quiescent as a niche to hide. After the completion of treatment, these cells can acquire resistance to the current treatment, begin growing and cause cancer recurrence. This process is called pharmacological quiescence.

name: FLUENT METAL INC Edit
elevator_pitch: Fluent Metal – we are an advanced materials startup developing refractory- and multi- metal components for the energy and defense industries. Advancing fusion, nuclear and hypersonics is highly dependent on special metal components which only Fluent Metal is positioned to supply. We have developed a novel metal manufacturing process that deposits molten drops of metals to build 3D shapes, special coatings or even electronics. We have 5 laboratory demonstrators and we are currently advancing applications with industry partners.
description: A critical manufacturing gap exists for refractory metals, particularly tungsten. The traditional method, powder metallurgy, is restricted to the production of basic shapes, failing to meet the complex demands of fusion, nuclear, and hypersonic technologies. On the other hand, legacy additive manufacturing methods, while providing freedom of design, cannot meet the structural requirements due to microcracks that occur due to high thermal impact. These industry limitations force engineers to compromise on design, hindering the potential performance and efficiency of critical components. Ultimately, this directly constrains development and slows down essential progress in these high-performance sectors. In addition, there are significant challenges for adopting metal additive manufacturing, rooted in the complexity of legacy systems: high investment costs, limitation of materials, and handling costs of powder feedstock. These complexities limit the scalability and accessibility of the technology, making it difficult to achieve cost-effective production at scale.
technology_description: Fluent Metal addresses the critical manufacturing gap for refractory and multi metals, particularly tungsten in combination with copper, with our innovative molten metal droplet deposition technology. Analogous to inkjet printing, our process precisely deposits molten metal droplets from wire feedstock—including tungsten and pure copper—on demand. Crucially, our melting process occurs away from the built component, eliminating melt pool formation and drastically reducing negative thermal impact. This minimizes microcracks, enabling the production of complex, structural 3D parts of complex shapes. Our versatile solution also allows for deposition onto diverse substrates, including non-planar coatings and multi-material assemblies, such as high-performance heat exchangers, unlocking new possibilities in fusion, nuclear, and hypersonic applications.
mit_connection: MIT alumni as founder | Founder: Peter Schmitt, PhD in robotics from MIT Media Lab Founding Advisor: Prof. John Hart
contact: 1035 Cambridge Street, Suite 9, Cambridge, MA, 02141 • mario@fluentmetal.com, startupexchange-admin@mit.edu, startupexchange@mit.edu
keywords: additive manufacturing, 3D printing, electronics, coatings, hypersonics, energy, metals, tungsten

name: FLUXTEQ LLC Edit
elevator_pitch: FluxTeq is a manufacturer of low-cost heat flux sensors and thermal instrumentation that can directly measure thermal energy transfer through the surfaces that they are attached to. These sensors can be used in a variety of applications that involve heat transfer with current customers ranging from building scientists, insulation manufactures and even wearable technology companies.
description: FluxTeq is a manufacturer of low-cost heat flux sensors and thermal instrumentation that can directly measure the energy loss/gain through surfaces. Applications and current customers of our sensor products range from building scientists, to thermal insulation manufactures and even wearable companies. Building science researchers use our sensors to monitor energy loss from buildings or directly measure the thermal resistance r-value of thermal insulation while it is still installed in a building wall. FluxTeq is also currently working on the development of a low-cost thermal energy flow/BTU meter. This BTU meter will be used in optimizing energy efficiency of HVAC control systems or for submetering energy distribution to tenants of a large building.

name: FLYBRIX Edit
elevator_pitch: Flybrix is a do-it-yourself robotics and electronics kit that is designed for ages 14+. Younger pilots will need hands-on adult help to be successful with Flybrix Kits, especially since Flybrix uses LEGO® bricks as a component of a more advanced experience than a standard LEGO® set. Fundamentally, Flybrix is an educational technology toy. It stretches your brain as you learn about electronics, physics, aerodynamics and robotics.
description: Flybrix Kits let you make rebuildable, crash-friendly drones using LEGO® bricks. The kit comes complete with all the parts and instructions to build three different drone designs (quad, hexacopter, and octocopter) without needing any extra tools or supplies. You can fly your designs and any other 4, 6 or 8-motor airframes, using our Flybrix Flight Control app or using an optional R/C controller. Flybrix is a kit that can't be outgrown. Even experts can push their limits by tinkering with the open source code that runs our powerful, programmable, and Arduino-compatible flightboard.

name: FOCUSED SPACE Edit
elevator_pitch: The remote and hybrid work market is growing. Flexible work has many benefits, but it comes with challenges, too: 48% of the 510M people working remotely are struggling with distractions, loneliness, burnout, and motivation. We have a unique product to help remote/hybrid teams get more done, focus on the right things, feel less stressed, and be more connected to one another. Our users accomplish 80% more with Focused Space, and are 51% less likely to burn out. We currently have 500+ subscribers across the US. Many of them get their memberships reimbursed by their employers, and we are excited to scale out the B2B path ahead by delivering benefits to both employees and employers.
description: Remote and hybrid work is becoming a more popular choice for employers, and for good reason: 63% of employees are willing to take a pay cut to work remotely — which allows companies to recruit top talent from anywhere [FlexJobs 2024]. Currently, the overwhelming majority of CEOs — 2 out of 3 surveyed — expect a hybrid future [KPMG 2024]. However, this new way of working doesn’t come with a “playbook”, and companies need help managing and supporting their distributed workforces. 48% of the 510M people working remotely are struggling with loneliness, burnout, and motivation [McKinsey]. Focused Space offers a unique productivity + wellness platform that empowers remote and hybrid teams to stay connected, engaged — and high-performing. Our users accomplish 80% more, and are 51% less likely to burn out. We pride ourselves on supporting teams toward both high performance and happiness!
technology_description: We are the first platform to blend mental health and productivity tools in one place. We have a multi-platform app, a unique data pipeline that delivers insights about team connection and productivity, and AI-backed personalization so each user gets the right support they need.
mit_connection: MIT alumni as founder | E14 fund participated in our pre-seed round.
contact: 2030 9th Avenue, Oakland, CA, 94606 • nodira@focused.space, startupexchange-admin@mit.edu, startupexchange@mit.edu
keywords: future of work, HR tech, Productivity, mental health, wellness, Efficiency

name: FORAY BIOSCIENCE Edit
elevator_pitch: At FORAY bio, we’re building biomanufacturing tools to protect and restore forest landscapes. Trees feed into nearly every aspect of our lives, from the air we breathe to the textiles we wear. Today, growing global demands for tree products, the changing climate, and intensifying natural disasters are placing our forests under immense strain. That’s why FORAY is building a biological toolkit that will allow us to cut down fewer trees and restore forests faster. The company is founded on plant cell culture technology that enables the growth of tree cells outside of the tree and steers the development of these cells to efficiently produce a wide variety of treeless goods from molecules to materials and seeds. FORAY’s platform enables the production of treeless goods up to 100 times faster and using 80% less land than traditional practice.
description: Trees fuel our economies, contributing more than $1T in goods on an annual basis. Unsustainable sourcing is driving resource loss and billions of dollars in ecological degradation. Because no sourcing alternatives exist for most tree-supplied products, innovative solutions are needed to prevent the loss of access to essential goods while preserving and restoring intact forest landscapes. That’s why FORAY is leveraging tree cell culture to supply tree products without cutting down a single tree. FORAY has developed a versatile platform that can produce a broad spectrum of plant products. Our first-of-a-kind plant cell culture platform will provide the first reliable, treeless alternative to traditionally-sourced molecules, materials, and seeds.
technology_description: FORAY's plant cell culture platform is bringing biomanufacturing to the 99.9% of plant species considered too difficult to work with today. The platform includes a first-ever predictive database for plant cell culture, a bank of novel and commercially relevant cell lines, and species agnostic workflows to accelerate cell line development and deployment.
mit_connection: MIT alumni as founder | Founder is MIT MS/PhD graduate, Company is funded by The Engine
contact: No Street Listed, Cambridge, MA, 02139 • hello@foraybio.com, startupexchange-admin@mit.edu, startupexchange@mit.edu
keywords: Forestry, Plant Cell Culture, biomanufacturing

name: FOUND ENERGY Edit
elevator_pitch: Found Energy is building high-energy-density, carbon-free hydrogen as a service to eliminate carbon emissions from heavy industrial applications ranging from maritime shipping (3% of global CO2 emissions) to fertilizer production (2% of global CO2 emissions). Using technology developed at MIT that enables aluminum to split water, we can store and deliver hydrogen on-demand safely at >5x the volumetric energy density of liquid hydrogen and >3x that of methanol and ammonia. Our ability to use low-value aluminum waste means our process is also the most economical way to generate green hydrogen for less than $0.50/kg. Taken together, Found Energy provides modular fuel packs that have both the energy density and economic incentive to actually compete with conventional hydrocarbon fuels and feedstocks.
description: Innovation in renewable energy production and short-term energy storage is accelerating, but renewable energy transportation is often overlooked. Energy storage technologies like electrochemical and thermal batteries are critical for this transition, but due to their low energy density, their use is limited to short-distance transportation and stationary applications (e.g. home and grid storage). Consequently, many potential energy markets (e.g. maritime shipping, industrial hydrogen, remote power generation) are currently left out of the renewable energy transition due to a technology gap in energy transportation - existing storage solutions fail to compete with fossil fuels on energy density, cost, and safety.
technology_description: Aluminum waste is abundant and highly energy-dense, with roughly double the volumetric energy density of diesel. A stable aluminum fuel can be produced directly from scrap using a fully recoverable and recyclable catalyst. This fuel reacts with water to produce clean hydrogen gas, heat, and an aluminum oxyhydroxide byproduct, which is environmentally benign and used in various industrial processes. Hydrogen can be generated this way for less than $0.50 per kilogram and stored at an effective volumetric energy density of 36 MJ per liter, which is five times greater than that of liquid hydrogen.
mit_connection: MIT-licensed technology | MIT alumni as founder | Peter Godart received S.B., S.M., and PhD degrees from MIT
contact: No Street Listed, Cambridge, MA, 02139 • peter@found.energy, startupexchange-admin@mit.edu, startupexchange@mit.edu
keywords: Hydrogen, energy storage, shipping fuel

name: FOUNDATION ALLOY Edit
elevator_pitch: Foundation engineers metals with ultra-high performance and scalability for next generation technologies in energy, defense, critical manufacturing, automotive and more. We do this using advanced computational methods, deep materials science expertise, and novel manufacturing technology that enables a previously-impossible level of control over the atomic structure of metals.
description: Foundation Alloy is developing the next evolution of high-performance metals, starting with nickel superalloys and refractories. Foundation alloys are designed for enhanced properties and part production, improving the final part performance while lowering costs, lead times and embodied energy in components for industries ranging from tooling to automotive and aerospace. Together, these breakthroughs provide engineers the new inputs and faster innovation cycles needed to enhance existing products, and enable entirely new ones, toward a safer, more sustainable and exciting future.
technology_description: Foundation is leveraging technology from MIT and UC Irvine that enables the design and manufacture of metals with superior properties. In addition, these metals can be made in a way that improves their producibility via 3D printing, eliminating many of the time, consistency and cost concerns currently limiting adoption of this manufacturing technique. Combined, this allows Foundation to print superior metal parts that are also more cost and time effective than any other suppliers'.

name: FOUNDATION EGI Edit
elevator_pitch: Foundation EGI is building the first Engineering General Intelligence platform to accelerate product development for design and manufacturing enterprises. Unlike traditional AI, which relies on statistical interpolation and struggles with the precision engineering demands, our platform is built to understand spatial relationships and the laws of physics. Where other AI models are black boxes prone to hallucinations, Foundation EGI delivers engineering outputs that are accurate, precise, and fully auditable — making it trustworthy for real-world, mission-critical tasks. We help companies eliminate repetitive bottlenecks, streamline development workflows, and build better products faster.
description: Design and manufacturing enterprises today have long, fragmented product development cycles, bogged down by tedious manual tasks and inefficient workflows. This slows innovation, increases costs, and delays time-to-market. This problem is most acute in sectors where complex physical products are designed, engineered, and manufactured. Target sectors are automotive, heavy machinery, professional equipment and tools. Our EGI platform accelerates the product development process and helps enterprises build better products faster.
technology_description: Foundation EGI employs a hybrid architecture that combines physics-based reasoning with machine learning, unlike traditional AI that relies purely on statistical interpolation. At the core of our platform is a domain-specific language (DSL) purpose-built for engineering — allowing precise, structured, and auditable representation of spatial relationships, physical behaviors, and product logic.
mit_connection: MIT faculty as founder | MIT alumni as founder | Prof. Wojciech Matusik is one of our co-founders.

keywords: Enterprise SaaS, design and manufacturing, product development

In addition, employees of resilient managers are 30% more productive, 50% less burned out, and 3x more resilient (Kellerman & Seligman, 2023).

name: GELSIGHT, INC. Edit
elevator_pitch: GelSight is a novel imaging technology that enables material-independent surface visualization and measurement through the GelSight sensor, a small pad of clear elastomer with a thin reflective coating. When pressed against a surface, the GelSight sensor transforms the reflective properties of the surface, revealing SEM-like surface detail using low-cost imaging devices. GelSight, Inc. has customers in a broad variety of markets from health care to consumer electronics.
description: GelSight, Inc. is a startup commercializing a 3D-imaging technology developed at MIT. The strength of GelSight technology lies in its ability to visualize and measure micron-scale surface detail of any material regardless of its optical properties. GelSight is a platform technology and the company has focused on a few key markets for commercialization while establishing partnerships to enable deployment of the technology into other markets. GelSight, Inc. current product portfolio includes automated systems for industrial inspection and compact handheld 3D-imaging devices.

name: GENERAL PROGNOSTICS INC. Edit
elevator_pitch: Approximately 25% of heart failure (HF) patients experience readmissions within a month after discharge, leading to significant costs for patients, insurers, and hospitals. Suboptimal medication contributes to this issue, as patients' conditions may worsen subtly, requiring additional therapy for stability, yet physicians' limited remote monitoring capabilities impede timely intervention. Implanted monitoring devices have proven to improve outcomes, but are limited in use to a very narrow segmen
description: Hospital readmissions for HF patients are frequent, as 25% of these patients will be readmitted to the hospital in less than 1 month after being discharged and hospital stays are costly for patients, insurers, and especially hospitals. A major reason for this is that these patients are often sub-optimally-medicated. This happens because though a patient may be optimally medicated at discharge, within a few days their condition may imperceptibly worsen, requiring additional therapy to remain stable. Unfortunately, physicians’ limited remote monitoring ability renders them insufficiently informed about patients’ conditions, causing the patients to be sub-optimally-medicated. The most recent published data about HF patient medication rates show that less than 1% of HF patients are optimally medicated. Therefore, optimal medication of these patients remains a major problem to be solved with timely insight from non-invasive, passive, and easily interpreted monitoring technologies, which in turn will reduce patient rehospitalizations and save cost.
technology_description: With extensive experience in med-device and blood diagnostics, GPx is well-positioned to tackle the challenge of reducing HF hospital readmissions. We have direct access to numerous hospitals, evident from the overwhelming sign-ups for the upcoming FDA pivotal study. Through the current clinical study, we have enrolled over 235 patients, accumulating more than 80 years of patient data. This has enabled the creation of a comprehensive digital and blood biomarker database for HF patients, larger than that of Roche and Mayo Clinic. GPx holds proprietary algorithms, developed by our team's expertise in high-fidelity algorithms for cardiac rhythm management and heart failure. These algorithms demonstrate impressive performance, with a sensitivity of 86% and a specificity of 99.5%. Exceeding FDA requirements and exceeding the predictive capabilities of implanted monitoring solutions, GPx's algorithms will continue to evolve and undergo validation through published clinical studies, thereby significantly raising the barrier to entry for potential competitors.
mit_connection: MIT alumni as founder | Javier Echenique is the Co-founder of GPx and its Chief Executive Officer. He has over fifteen years of experience in the medical device industry, in engineering, sales, and product management roles. Prior to GPx he led patient management efforts at HeartWare, where he launched multiple patient diagnostic and monitoring products. Javier holds a Bachelor and Masters degree in Mechanical Engineering from MIT and an MBA from Harvard Business School.
contact: 50 Milk Street, 16th Floor, Boston, MA, 02109 • contact@gpx.ai, startupexchange-admin@mit.edu, startupexchange@mit.edu
keywords: Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning, digital health, remote patient monitoring

name: GENERATE Edit
elevator_pitch: Generate is a tech-enabled architecture platform. We are committed to the sustainable development of cities, and specialize in streamlining the design and delivery of mass timber through our pre-vetted building solutions and generative systems.
description: Rapid urban densification translates into urgency to both increase and optimize global building supply. While the world runs a deficit of millions of housing units, cities face at once this extreme housing shortage and ambitious environmental goals. Major U.S. cities have plans to build hundreds of thousands of housing units and millions of square feet of commercial buildings. In parallel, they are starting to adopt zero-net carbon standards for all new public buildings by 2030. These twin pressures—coupled with sky-high housing prices—showcase the need for 21st-century building technologies to be agile, cost-competitive, and capable of meeting aggressive environmental goals. Global forests would benefit tremendously from supplying their regional construction markets, while concurrently functioning as ecosystems for carbon storage and helping cities attain their carbon goals. Yet most forests remain overgrown and undervalued, due to lack of investment and management. Buildings account for 40% of all greenhouse gas emissions (through operational and embodied energy), indicating an urgent need for energy-intelligent and economic building systems. Mass timber buildings act as carbon sinks through CO2 storage, low emission of greenhouse gases, low pollution and waste. Adopted at scale, mass timber would increase the economic value of forests; galvanize their proper management; and unlock an affordable housing solution. Yet, the development of replicable and geography-adaptable, mass timber building systems remains of high technical risk, as few project stakeholders have the tools to design with these digitized systems in a cost-effective way—which means they end up opting for carbon-emitting systems, like concrete.
technology_description: Generate is a first-of-its-kind design platform that enables the creation of full-fidelity, pre-engineered sustainable mass timber designs within minutes. Generate offers a one-stop solution for the design, engineering, and construction of mass timber buildings, by empowering architects, engineers, builders, and owners to create accurate, affordable, and sustainable mass timber design solutions with real building products and systems. Our platform streamlines the design process and eliminates the need for manual drawings and calculations, enabling architects and engineers to quickly turn their designs into constructible mass timber buildings; and manufacturers to link their products directly to real projects. Generate allows project stakeholders to design in a code, cost, carbon, and product-aware space that links design to manufacturing, short-circuiting the linear process of project delivery. Our pre-vetted building solutions and generative tools aim to reduce mass timber construction costs while increasing construction speed, leading to an increase in built mass timber projects, and enhanced demand for carbon-sequestering building products. This approach synergistically increases the presence of sustainable manufacturers, and the output of energy-efficient, high-density, and biophilic affordable housing—in turn leading to the creation of new, sustainable infrastructure; better-utilized forests; and new, mission-driven jobs nation- and world-wide. Generate’s approach significantly reduces upfront time and costs to integrate mass timber systems into projects, while helping restore the health of our forests, as part of a renewable material, closed-loop economy. Our goal is to augment the design process, while enabling the creation of better, more beautiful, sustainable, affordable, and more livable cities for all.

name: GEOSCOUT LTD. Edit
elevator_pitch: GeoScout's combination of overlapping variable pitch props with the power of conventional fuel turbines redefines UAVs to fly faster, further and longer with real payloads than any other electrical or hybrid UAV. GeoScout's technology creates a true aerial robot that providing a platform for solving real world challenges ranging from gas-pipeline leaks to detection of noxious chemicals and IEDs in a war zone.
description: Boston area startup focusing on developing a conventionally fuel UAV with superior performance characteristics. GeoScout realized that the current UAV market is segmented into two groups - the prosumer level of drone that can only fly for short periods of time and carry small payloads and the high end military and industrial grade of drone that is typically a fixed wing or helicopter design and costs over $100,000. Our approach is to combine characteristics of the high end (conventional fuel power sources that directly drive rotors) with aspects of the prosumer (hex rotor design utilizing automated controls.) The current design is capable of flying for over two hours and can carry a payload of 30 ponds or more. Thus, GeoScout can carry lab instrumentation that is commonly found today - LIDAR units, mass spectrometers and gas chromatographs - that electric and hybrid drones are unable to lift.

name: GMG ARCDATA Edit
elevator_pitch: We have developed a mobile-friendly app which enhances cancer patient engagement to improve care and patient experience and outcome. In partnership with a large regional healthcare system, we conducted a successful pilot in 2021 involving patient users and provider users to confirm validity, availability, and usability. We are preparing to expand the pilot to include more patient users and additional sites and collect more insights.
description: Cancer patients often deal with a life-threatening disease(s) while navigating complex health care systems, administrative barriers, and large volumes of medical information. Providers care for and communicate with anxious patients & caregivers who desire more frequent and tailored communication but are resource-constrained. Our solution helps patients and providers exchange and access relevant, timely information through habit-forming self-care tasks, curated patient education resources, integrated smart devices/sensors, and remote monitoring w/ real-time alerts.
technology_description: Our solution empowers cancer patients to take control of their care through digital health experience that is shaped by user feedback from real-life cancer patients, caregivers, and providers. Designed and developed from ground up, our solution is grounded in care plans and processes that are curated and presented in coordination with an upcoming encounter or medical procedure. Additionally, patient "tasks" such as pre-surgical bowel prep, vitals monitoring, exercise, and diet are automatically scheduled based on appointments and procedures. By providing evidence-based, timely information, our solution helps patients engage in their care and reduces the cognitive burden placed upon them and their caregivers and providers. Based on our market research, there are few, if any, solutions in the market that serve both patients/caregivers and providers. Our solution is integrated with a major electronic health record platform via FHIR APIs as well as smart sensors and devices.

name: GOODLII Edit
elevator_pitch: Investor Introduction to Goodlii: Revolutionizing Beauty Tech in India Overview: Goodlii is poised to disrupt the beauty industry with its pioneering beauty tech platform focused on simplifying appointment scheduling through AI. With a Total Addressable Market (TAM) estimated at USD 18 billion, Goodlii aims to bring structure to the currently fragmented and unregulated salon industry in India. The Problem: The beauty and wellness sector in India faces significant challenges due to its lack of organization and inefficiencies in appointment management. Customers often struggle with inconsistent service quality and difficulty in finding and booking appointments that suit their schedules. The Solution: Goodlii addresses these pain points by leveraging IT to streamline appointment scheduling. Its platform allows users to easily book appointments at their preferred salons, ensuring convenience and reliability. By centralizing this process, Goodlii enhances user experience and satisfaction while empowering salon owners with tools for efficient business management. Market Opportunity: The TAM of USD 18 billion underscores the vast potential in India’s beauty and wellness sector. Goodlii’s scalable SaaS and e-commerce model positions it uniquely to capture significant market share by offering both technological infrastructure and a seamless user experience. Business Model: Goodlii operates on a dual revenue model: SaaS Platform: Subscription-based revenue from salon owners for access to the scheduling and management tools. E-commerce: Commission-based revenue from sales of beauty products and services booked through the platform. Competitive Advantage: TECH-Powered Scheduling: Superior technology that optimizes scheduling based on user preferences and salon availability. Scalability: Ability to expand rapidly across India’s major cities, capitalizing on the growing trend towards digital solutions in the beauty sector. Regulatory Compliance: Addressing the lack of industry standards by bringing structure and transparency through technology. Vision: Goodlii’s vision is to establish itself as the leading beauty tech platform in India, setting industry standards for efficiency and customer satisfaction. By integrating advanced Tech capabilities with a robust SaaS and e-commerce framework, Goodlii aims to elevate the salon experience for millions of users while driving growth for salon businesses nationwide. Conclusion: With a strong market fit, innovative technology, and a scalable business model, Goodlii presents a compelling opportunity for investment. By backing Goodlii, investors can participate in transforming the landscape of India’s beauty industry while capitalizing on substantial growth potential in a burgeoning market.
description: The beauty and wellness sector in India faces significant challenges due to its lack of organization and inefficiencies in appointment management. Customers often struggle with inconsistent service quality and difficulty in finding and booking appointments that suit their schedules

name: GPR, INC. (FORMERLY WAVESENSE) Edit
elevator_pitch: Self-driving vehicles will save millions of lives and transform the economy. Before they become mainstream, they need to be able to navigate safely and reliably in all types of road and weather conditions. GPR's map enables just that by radically reducing navigation failure rates. Every road in the world has a unique subsurface signature. GPR uses ground penetrating radar to create a map of those subsurface signatures from which self-driving cars can navigate.
description: Self-driving vehicles will save millions of lives and transform the economy. Before they become mainstream, they need to be able to navigate safely and reliably in all types of road and weather conditions. GPR's map enables just that by radically reducing navigation failure rates. Every road in the world has a unique subsurface signature. GPR uses ground penetrating radar to create a map of those subsurface signatures from which self-driving cars can navigate. Vehicles using the GPR map are unaffected by common but challenging road conditions like snow, heavy rain, fog, or poor lane markings. Because GPR's solution is independent of dynamic environments above the road, it can improve overall navigation by orders of magnitude when combined with existing sensor suites, even in clear conditions. GPR will accelerate the arrival of self-driving vehicles, help save millions of lives, and transform the future of transport.
technology_description: GPR, Inc. (formerly WaveSense) is pioneering the safest and highest performing assisted driving and autonomous capabilities with Ground Positioning Radar™ (GPR). As the world’s most precise and reliable vehicle positioning system, Ground Positioning Radar™ allows vehicles to determine their precise location with centimeter-level accuracy, no matter how challenging road conditions become. GPR is working closely with automakers and Tier 1 partners to help vehicles safely navigate where current ADAS technologies fall short and to realize a vision of the future where AVs are the standard.
mit_connection: MIT-licensed technology | MIT alumni as founder | GPR is the exclusive worldwide licensee of autonomous vehicle technology developed at Lincoln Laboratory. Byron Stanley (MIT undergraduate and graduate alumnus, Former MIT Lincoln Laboratory) is a co-founder and CTO.

name: GRADIENT TECHNOLOGIES Edit
elevator_pitch: Gradient solves digital identity security by eliminating the ability for attackers to steal digital credentials.
description: Gradient is a Cambridge, MA based venture backed startup developing a secure and privacy-preserving distributed system based on silicon root of trust and anonymous attestation. Our target platforms span from cloud-scale computing and storage, to the simplest of connected devices. Gradient is truly full stack: we’ve built our own secure processor architecture based upon over a decade of work at MIT and elsewhere. Combined with low level software security measures that enforce authenticity and integrity of information continuously, and a novel key management architecture - we achieve strong security and privacy guarantees with minimal overhead; it’s no longer a choice between security and collaboration - Gradient technologies provide for both. At Gradient we see a world in which the authenticity and integrity of every electronic device, the software it operates, data it stores and computes, and information itself, are provable qualities by construction, not by trust in a third party.

name: GUIDING PHARMACEUTICALS Edit
elevator_pitch: Multiple Myeloma is a deadly blood cancer with an under 50% 5 year survival rate. The market for treatment of Multiple Myeloma was $7.5 bln in 2015 and is expected to grow to $37.5 bln by 2024. Velcade is the primary treatment for this disease, making up 33% of the market share. We have made a novel, deliverable chemical that acts through the same mechanistic pathways as Velcade tripling mouse life expectancy when compared to Velcade.
description: Guiding Pharmaceuticals is focused on the development of drug delivery vehicles through the invention of novel chemical formulations. name: HEALTH[AT]SCALE Edit
elevator_pitch: HEALTH[at]SCALE's Analytical Engine and Application Suites are based on new approaches to machine learning and artificial intelligence with specialized technologies by placing importantance on a variety of challenges (e.g., issues of sample size, event rates, poor or inconsistent data quality, fragmented datasets, multi-modal parameters, time-varying changes, integration of knowledge bases, workflow constraints etc.) that are often restrictive in real-world settings.
description: The team at HEALTH[at]SCALE consists of a leading and nationally-recognized group of faculty and researchers with deep expertise in healthcare big data analytics and strong ties to top institutions including MIT, Harvard, and the University of Michigan. For over a decade, the team has shared a common passion for moving the needle on how complex healthcare datasets that are increasingly being collected in routine care settings can be leveraged through novel problem formulations and award-winning algorithmic innovations to derive actionable insights and solutions to major healthcare challenges. We believe that the specialized needs of payers, pharma and device companies, and providers cannot be adequately addressed through general-purpose analytics developed across unrelated domains and often looking to scale up ideas that have been around for decades. Instead, the team at HEALTH[at]SCALE aims to empower healthcare industries through innovations in machine learning and artificial intelligence designed from the ground up for specific healthcare use cases. HEALTH[at]SCALE's Analytical Engine and Application Suites build on this experience and are based on fundamentally new approaches to machine learning and artificial intelligence that are richly integrated with deep domain knowledge of healthcare use-cases, clinical workflows, systems physiology, and medicine. We have built our tools from the ground up for transformative healthcare impact, and have specialized our technologies beyond simply dealing with problems of scale by placing great important on a broad variety of practical challenges (e.g., issues of sample size, event rates, poor or inconsistent data quality, fragmented datasets, multi-modal parameters, time-varying changes, integration of knowledge bases, workflow constraints etc.) that are often restrictive in real-world settings. Enterprise Analytics-as-a-Service (AaaS) -- Fast, Scalable and Uncomplicated Use of Advanced Analytics The novel Analytics-as-a-Service (AaaS) model is designed to offer customers the maximum opportunity to apply our advanced computational intelligence technologies to their datasets in a simple and cost-effective manner, and to achieve actionable insights from complex healthcare datasets with minimum overhead. Our core philosophy is that truly intelligent systems are self-learning and self-configuring and deliver unprecedented analytical power with unprecedented ease of use. HEALTH[at]SCALE's technologies follow this philosophy. If you have the data, our technologies will take care of the rest -- all the way from selecting, optimizing, tuning, and executing complex pipelines, to pre-processing and analyzing the data, to delivering interpretable results and helping deploy the findings in a scalable manner for broad practical use. We offer multiple AaaS solutions addressing a variety of needs across the healthcare industry, and across the spectrum of therapeutic design and use.

name: HELIX CARBON Edit
elevator_pitch: Helix Carbon is decarbonizing industrial chemicals by transforming captured CO2 into carbon-neutral fuels & chemicals. Born from MIT innovations, we combine dramatically improved catalysts with cheaper materials to create CO2-based carbon feedstocks that are cost-competitive in fossil-reliant markets.
description: In order to effectively combat climate change, we need to both replace fossil fuels in our energy economy and also as a carbon feedstock to the world’s chemicals industry. Captured carbon today is either sequestered underground or, more often, used to pump more fossil fuels, unscalable and unhelpful business models that don’t solve the core climate challenge.
technology_description: Helix Carbon's technology is based on innovations in electrocatalysis developed at MIT which dramatically improve the energy efficiency, selectivity, and capital cost of electrolytic CO2 conversion. Our proprietary, non-precious metal catalysts are cheaper, last longer, and perform better than those in existing CO2 electrolyzers, enabling chemicals production costs that are competitive with existing fossil-based sources. We can enable the single-step electrochemical conversion of CO2 to carbon monoxide, ethylene, or methane.

name: HERONAI Edit
elevator_pitch: We want to be the world's most user-friendly data analytics hub specializing in dark data. Where we help create a 360-degree view of your business automatically in 5 minutes. We offer businesses unparalleled, high-quality, innovative, and automatic data analytics that seamlessly integrate with multiple industries to revolutionize how businesses drive mission and revenue.
description: In the current landscape, data analytics stands as a highly lucrative industry, primarily due to the emphasis on big data. Two decades earlier, an accounting firm managing 3,000 clients would typically handle up to 1 TB of data. In stark contrast, today's modern firms grapple with over 15 TB of data per client. This exponential increase is attributed to the advent of digitalization, evolving regulatory demands, and the advancement of analytical methodologies. Over the next 18 months, our strategic focus is directed towards individual Certified Public Accountants (CPAs), as well as small to mid-sized accounting firms that are keen on embracing technological advancements. Our target market encompasses firms with average annual revenues of around $25 million and a typical staff size of 250. These firms are already employing data analytics tools such as Excel, QuickBooks, Tableau, or Power BI, but are actively seeking more efficient alternatives to enhance their operations. In a typical accounting firm, between 5 to 20 professionals allocate about 20 to 60 percent of their work time to analytics tasks, encompassing areas such as financial performance, tax, compliance, and Business Intelligence and Reporting. However, the complexity of these tasks often leads to a scenario where over 80% of the data becomes 'dark data' - unutilized and overlooked. This not only results in missed opportunities and revenues but also demands substantial investment in specialized training, costing firms an average of $18,000 to $90,000 per individual annually. Our proposed solution is a product designed to automate these analytical tasks. It aims not to replace staff but to substantially enhance their productivity. This could potentially translate into significant annual savings for firms, ranging from $140,000 to $960,000. The cost of integrating our software into these companies is set at $3,000 per month, offering a cost-effective and efficient solution for firms looking to navigate the complexities of modern data analytics.
technology_description: At HeronAI, we've pioneered the development of the first fully automated, centralized end-to-end dark data analytics system tailored for accounting firms. This groundbreaking system is not just for specialists; it's designed to be accessible to all. Our AI-driven technology empowers accountants with actionable insights, autonomously analyzing client context data to generate customized dashboards and reports, thereby saving time and boosting revenue. Consider the case of Susan, an accountant at RockTree. She previously spent extensive hours on manual data entry and analysis. With HeronAI, she can now swiftly integrate comprehensive retail business data, including web and social media analytics, leading to vital insights like identifying non-optimal staffing during peak hours. Our system, which is 99% more advanced than existing solutions, leverages recursive retrieval to uncover deeper, interconnected insights from hierarchical documents. We're revolutionizing Large Language Models (LLMs) through our Resource Allocation Graph (RAG) system, offering cost-effective, privacy-conscious solutions for small and medium-sized businesses. Additionally, we enhance LLMs using company-specific data and ontologies for improved understanding and structured knowledge, making complex analytics tasks more efficient and intuitive.

description: Holobiome is a pre-clinical company developing microbiome-based therapeutics for diseases of the central and enteric nervous systems. Initial targets include stressed-induced insomnia, treatment resistant depression (TRD), and intestinal motility disorders. Unlike many other microbiome companies, we are mechanism focused -- our lead products consist of naturally occurring consortia of bacteria, isolated from healthy humans, with the capability to modulate host neurotransmitters/neurotransmission. Given the broad role of these systems in human health and disease, we anticipate our products will have utility in a multitude of other diseases, including anxiety, epilepsy, and neurodegeneration. We are actively seeking Series A investment and additional partners for our TRD and intestinal motility programs (having established a partnership with Johnson and Johnson on our insomnia program in January of 2018).

Honeycomb is a power tool built by engineers for engineers, designed to debug complex systems and answer arbitrary, ad hoc questions about those systems in real time. Some of the things you can expect from a precision tool like Honeycomb: - Reduce MTTR for outages and degraded services. - Identify bugs and performance regressions, isolate multiple contributing factors to complex failures. - Reproduce user bug reports. Refine the results by iteratively slicing and dicing on arbitrary fields in realtime. The primary mission is to make engineers better over time, and to capture and preserve the collective debugging skills of the team. Complex systems and unpredictable user behavior combine to consume a massive chunk of a good engineering team’s time; we can help.

As our first target, we are using our enzymes to break down the po

name: HYPERION BIOSYSTEMS (FORMERLY C2SENSE, INC.) Edit
elevator_pitch: Hyperion Biosystems (formerly called C2Sense) has created a suite of diagnostic devices that leverage our expertise in computer vision and physics-based algorithms to deliver exquisite performance at the lowest price.
description: C2Sense is currently working to bring two products to market: Halo Diagnostics, a digitally connected immunoassay reader with a user-friendly hardware and software, provide near-PCR sensitivity to address the gap in the patient-to-provider workflow. The Halo hardware is supported by a cloud-based, HIPAA compliant software solution that provides real-time test results to patients using an app (iOS/Android) or a web portal and, simultaneously, can be shared with a Telehealth physician to expedite time sensitive therapeutic prescriptions. To rapidly scale this technology, C2Sense partners with with immunoassay test manufacturers that own large portfolios of antigen tests that, pre-pandemic, had been exclusively providing tests to hospitals and urgent care facilities. By pairing these tests with a digitally enabled, highly sensitive test readers, remote physicians have access to store and review the same test results their patients are seeing in real time. In conjunction with Halo, C2Sense has designed different sensing solutions to provide product quality information and counterfeit detection from the point of manufacturing out to the customer. Discretely printed onto or included in a product, the tags are safe, versatile molecular additives that instantaneously report valuable information about the status of a good. They identify counterfeits and, where required, they are designed to react to problems encountered in the distribution chain (temperature change, oxygen sensing, and more). The tags are compatible with products as small as a pill, or can coat entire packaging surfaces, enabled by the tags’ compatibility with a myriad of printing and coating techniques.
technology_description: C2Sense’s technology suite features sophisticated combinations of low-cost hardware, sensing materials and advanced software. The company’s partners use the information provided by C2Sense to make better decisions about their health, well-being and products.

name: IMAGIRATION Edit
elevator_pitch: ImagiRation is developing prescription digital therapeutics for children with autism based on the issued patent US20160210870. Our language therapy application MITA demonstrated excellent results in a 3-year observational study of 6,454 children with autism. Children who engaged with MITA showed 2.2-fold greater language improvement than children with similar initial evaluations. MITA has received FDA breakthrough device designation on 02/24/2021 (Q210093).
description: The CDC estimates that 1 in 54 children is affected by autism, a neurological disorder that disrupts early development in cognition and communication, leading to impairment in cognitive and social functions, and difficulty in acquiring new adaptive behaviors. Up to 70% of children diagnosed with autism spectrum disorder (ASD) experience language difficulties. There is a broad scientific consensus that early and intensive language therapy has the greatest promise of significantly improving outcomes. However, the availability, quality, and general funding for early intervention programs is often lacking, leaving newly diagnosed children without adequate and sufficient therapy during the most critical early period of their development. Over the last decade, ImagiRation has developed a highly innovative adaptive language therapy application for children with ASD, Mental Imagery Therapy for Autism (MITA). In the manuscript published in the journal Healthcare, ImagiRation reports the result of a 3-year clinical study of 6,454 ASD children ages 2 to 12 years. Children who engaged with MITA showed 2.2-fold greater language improvement than children with similar initial evaluations. This difference was statistically significant (p<0.0001). The MITA application includes both verbal and nonverbal exercises aiming to develop Prefrontal Synthesis (PFS), the neurological mechanism responsible for the juxtaposition of mental visuospatial objects into novel combinations at will. Most people assume the presence of innate PFS abilities in all individuals. However, therapists, researchers, and caregivers working with children with ASD appreciate the challenges of PFS acquisition. Even when language therapy is administered daily, some children never build up the neurological connections essential for PFS. Failure to acquire PFS ability results in a lifelong deficiency in understanding complex language such as, spatial prepositions, recursion, and, fairytales, which require the listener to imagine unrealistic situations. Among individuals diagnosed with ASD, the prevalence of lifelong PFS paralysis is 30 to 40% and can be as high as 60% among children enrolled in special ASD schools. MITA verbal activities train PFS by using higher forms of language, such as noun-adjective combinations, spatial prepositions, recursion, and syntax. For example, a child can be instructed to put the cup {behind|in front of|on|under} the table or take animals home following an explanation that the lion lives above the monkey and under the cow. In every activity a child listens to a short story and then works within an immersive interface to generate an answer. Correct answers are rewarded with pre-recorded encouragement and animations. MITA nonverbal activities aim to provide the same PFS training visually through implicit instructions. For example, a child can be presented with two separate images: that of a train and a window pattern. The task is to mentally integrate the train and the window pattern and to match the result of integration to the picture of the complete train positioned among several incorrect trains. The child is encouraged to avoid trial-and-error, focusing instead on integrating separate train parts mentally, thus training PFS. Different games use various tasks and visual patterns to keep the child engaged.
technology_description: MITA is based on the issued patent US20160210870. MITA uses verbal and nonverbal adaptive exercises, that emphasize the ability to juxtapose mental visuospatial objects. This ability called prefrontal synthesis can be impaired in children with autism, leading to what is commonly described as stimulus overselectivity or “tunnel vision.” Improving prefrontal synthesis has been shown to leads to vast improvements in general learning.

name: INDIGO TECHNOLOGIES Edit
elevator_pitch: Indigo Technologies, Inc. (formerly Nucleus Scientific) is focused on revolutionizing the cost, performance, and efficiency of electric mobility. Indigo has matured several motor, battery, and wireless charging technologies and emerged from stealth in 2019 to bring these advances to market. Indigo has coupled all these technologies into several road-ready electric vehicle concepts used for testing, validation, and demonstration.
description: Indigo Technologies, Inc. (formerly Nucleus Scientific) is a Cambridge, MA-based technology company focused on revolutionizing the cost, performance, and efficiency of electric mobility. Founded in 2010 by MIT professor Ian Hunter, Indigo employs over 30 engineers and scientists with expertise spanning mechanical, electrical, computer systems, aerospace and ocean engineering. The team’s impressive academic credentials include 10 PhDs and 18 Masters’ degrees. Indigo has matured several motor, battery, and wireless charging technologies and emerged from stealth in 2019 to bring these advances to market. Indigo has coupled all these technologies into several road-ready electric vehicle concepts used for testing, validation, and demonstration. The team’s attention to detail and ability to develop disruptive solutions from first-principles permeates the design of these systems. Well equipped facilities allow the team to move concepts from design to prototype quickly.
technology_description: The Draco prototype vehicle is a safe, comfortable, and road-legal two passenger electric vehicle with a range greater than 200 km. It is powered by Indigo‘s in-wheel motors with integrated active suspension and uses a wireless energy transfer system for charging. A carbon fiber safety structure, designed to Formula 1 crash safety standards and NHTSA safety compliance, surrounds the occupants. In addition to Draco, Indigo has fielded a series of vehicles as reference designs in order to prove the efficiency of our in-wheel Traction T1 motors, energy management, and charge systems. Indigo's Traction T1 in-wheel motor includes integrated active suspension. This compact yet powerful motor is ideal for the next generation of light-weight and efficient electric vehicles. The Traction T1 motor provides integral active suspension and vehicle body control without the need for additional expensive and complicated actuators. The T1 intelligently governs the flow of power between propulsion and suspension actuation. The active suspension is also capable of returning energy to the batteries under bumpy conditions turning pot holes into power. Indigo’s high-precision battery analysis lab allows testing of batteries to evaluate their behavior and performance under realistic conditions and usage scenarios. Using in-house developed precision cell analysis equipment, Indigo provides customers with precisely fit battery models they can use to design their battery powered systems. Our model-based, and AI-enabled, battery management algorithms estimate battery state with high accuracy and robustness. Indigo wireless power transfer technology provides unmatched efficiency and flexibility in a compact package. Our two-way system allows vehicles to share power while our patented shielding ensure a light-weight system that meets all major electro-magnetic safety standards.

name: INDUSTRIALML, INC. Edit
elevator_pitch: IndustrialML is building the data integration and analysis tools to make factories smarter with machine learning. We combine applications in live monitoring, visual analysis, and machine learning to deliver actionable real-time insights to operators and engineers.
description: IndustrialML is a Boston-based enterprise software company serving industrial customers. We make factories smarter with machine learning, combining process monitoring and real-time analytics to keep production lines running. Unplanned downtime and quality defects cost process manufacturers 20% of their production potential. This problem is particularly pronounced among process manufacturers such as steel, aluminum, or paper producers, which generate $2 trillion in global output every year. To maximize uptime and reduce scrap, operators must know in real-time when and where errors occur. However, industries reliant on visual inspection are underserved by IIoT platforms that do not integrate both machine vision and streaming data analytics. Most advanced analysis tools that do chase advanced insights are designed solely for data scientists. Our SaaS platform uses live monitoring, visual analysis, and machine learning to deliver actionable insights to operators and engineers, in real time.
technology_description: Our work at IndustrialML began with the realization that existing Industry 4.0 platforms could not integrate key sources of information required for actionable analysis. As a result, the first area where we had to develop capabilities was in building the necessary connectors, interpreters, and gateways to integrate data from multiple sources (sensors, enterprise IT, and video sources) into a modern data backend. The next challenge with using existing platforms was their emphasis on data from machines or similarly structured sources, but these alone cannot provide an understanding of process outcomes. Knowing a motor or sensor is operating below optimum range is only useful if there is context on the resulting impact on the end-product. Adding machine vision enables us to flag defects in real-time, thus closing the loop between the quality of production results and the machine parameters that produced good results. The platform then provides operators and engineers with immediate notifications of issues so they can take the steps necessary to remediate or prevent issues.

description: Cooling towers are ubiquitous in power generation, chemicals, data centers, and commercial air conditioning, and they are the second largest source of water consumption in the US. Similar systems are also used for carbon capture. Infinite Cooling's patented technologies use physics-informed machine learning to offer optimization and predictive maintenance for cooling towers through an IoT offering. In addition to optimizing existing assets, Infinite Cooling offers a new patented technology to capture water or other liquids from the drift and the plumes that are emitted from cooling towers. The captured liquid is then re-used within the plant. By working with Infinite Cooling, customers significantly reduce their water consumption and water treatment costs. They also become more energy efficient and eliminate emissions which can be particularly problematic in the case of contaminated water or carbon capture chemicals.

name: INNOVATIVE WORKS Edit
elevator_pitch: Newborn male circumcision is the most commonly performed surgery in the World. We have developed a novel, disposable, single use, device that makes the procedure safer, easier, and less expensive. We have a manufacturer, four issued U.S. patents, FDA clearance, and have completed $7 Million in clinical testing. We are ready to launch the product in the United States using outpatient centers of excellence that will revolutionize this important procedure.
description: Our goal is to transform newborn male circumcision care throughout the World. In 2007, the World Health Organization concluded that male circumcision is effective at preventing heterosexual transmission of HIV. This same year, UNAIDS concluded that newer and safer methods for performing newborn male circumcision are needed. We took on this challenge and developed a novel newborn male circumcision device that is less expensive, faster, easier, and safer to use. The device is disposable and better protects patients from injury, regardless of the experience of the provider and is designed to be used safely anywhere in the World.
technology_description: The AccuCirc is a new state of the art infant male circumcision device. The device comes in a sterile pack and is a single use disposable device. This eliminates the injuries that occur from old, worn or defective reusable clamps. Every AccuCirc kit comes with its own surgical marking pen and procedure starts with this critical step to ensure the most accurate outcome. Unlike some male circumcision devices that leave the tip of the penis unprotected, the AccuCirc uses a protective shield that is placed on the tip of the penis and protects the newborn during the procedure. The foreskin holder is another safety feature built into this device. It allows for very accurate positioning of the foreskin prior to making the incision which allows for a precise amount of skin to be removed every time providing for very accurate and consistent results. The AccuCirc also uses a proprietary internal circular blade that is controlled precisely by the device and ensures that the penis is protected before, during, and after the procedure. The device is equipped with a safety guard that helps prevent removing too much tissue during the procedure, ensuring an excellent outcome.

In other words, Inrupt is here to help drive the next stage of the web.
description: It’s time to reset the balance of power on the web and reignite its true potential. Inrupt’s here to help drive this next stage of the web. Solid is the technically potent open-source platform built to decentralize the web. Inrupt is the company that’s helping to fuel Solid’s success. Many talented people have been working on Solid, inspired and led by Sir Tim Berners-Lee. Inrupt was founded by Berners-Lee and his partner, John Bruce, to provide the required resources to take Solid from the vision of a few to the reality of many. Inrupt’s here to help drive this next stage of the web. It’s impossible to predict the changes this will evoke -- it’ll be a long and exciting journey, into an unclear but certain future.

elevator_pitch: InSanirator is solving the problem of urban sanitation through a technological innovation converting raw sewage into bio-crude oil, energy and clean water. Our system fits into a 20’ shipping container and deployed at a community scale to serve the waste of 50,000 people/day
description: Accion is developing advanced technologies for the new space industry. We are striving to become a leader in high-quality, affordable propulsion technologies that enable increased access to space. The propulsion systems are some of the first that can turn affordable satellites into capable ones. Accion will reinvest their knowledge and resources into bringing the latest advances from other industries to aerospace, and will work to lower barriers to entry through decreased development cycles and costs for propulsion and other subsystems.
technology_description: The developed system takes in raw sewage, among other types of wet-biomass, and under the catalytic activity of sub-critical water breaks down organic molecules into their small building blocks, then recombining them to produce bio-crude oil, hydrochar and clean water. Hydrochar is further gasified to produce the energy necessary to self sustain the system.

name: INSPEK Edit
elevator_pitch: InSpek aims to reduce the costs and delays caused by errors in biological and chemical processes through improved chemical detection. InSpek’s real-time chemical monitoring system, based on patented optical microchip sensors that are more sensitive, cheaper, and smaller than current products, enables users from a variety of industries to optimize their chemical processes and prevent costly and wasteful mistakes in process development and production.
description: Biological and chemical processes are the main building blocks of manufacturing in many industries such as pharma and biotech, oil&gas, synthetic biology, fine chemicals, etc. Failures in these processes do happen, that result in higher costs and delays for the final products. These failures are notably due to the complexity of the processes and the ensuing lack of understanding, which prevents from controlling and optimizing them.
technology_description: InSpek is developing a chemical monitoring system based on waveguide-enhanced Raman spectroscopy (or "Raman-on-a-chip"), which will provide real-time chemical composition data and thus help better characterize and understand the processes. Raman spectroscopy is a well-known chemical analysis method that has been used for decades in several industries. Raman-on-a-chip brings the benefits of integrated photonics (optics on a chip) to Raman spectroscopy: a better sensitivity; a lower cost, which notably makes our sensors compatible with single-use technologies; and a smaller size.

name: IRRADIANT TECHNOLOGIES INC. Edit
elevator_pitch: Irradiant Technologies is creating a revolution in nanofabrication that unlocks the full potential of optics and photonics by enabling the complete control of refractive index in 3D with deeply sub-wavelength resolution.
description: The ability to pattern arbitrary 3D structures on the nanometer scale offers unprecedented control over photons, phonons, and electrons, which in turn has the potential to revolutionize almost every aspect of modern technology. Implosion Fabrication can realize this revolution. As featured in Science Magazine, NIH, and CNN, Implosion Fabrication allows for ultrafast and affordable 3D assembly of mixed materials. Assemblies can include a wide range of materials in any geometry with nanoscale precision and gradient control.
technology_description: The possible applications of this technology are nearly limitless. Sub-wavelength structuring of optical materials enables the creation of flat metaoptics that outperform traditional bulk optics and that can compress complex optical functions into a single nanometer scale film. Complete three dimensional control of nanoscale multi-material structures makes it possible to create integrated optical circuits with unique optical components. Potential applications extend beyond optics, including the use of nanostructures to separate the transport properties of phonons and electrons for energy harvesting and thermal management technologies. Other possibilities include ultrahigh density data storage, implantable biointerfaces, mechanical metamaterials, nanolaser and nanoantenna arrays, and more.

name: JAXON, INC. Edit
elevator_pitch: Jaxon autonomously labels raw data for training other machine learning applications on new concepts, contexts, and domain-specific terminology.
description: Artificial intelligence is currently powered by armies of humans. Machines cannot read natural language like humans do, so massive efforts are underway to manually label the data necessary for training machine learning models to understand human language. Typically, millions of examples (sentences, tweets, emails, documents, etc.) are needed, and even more for deep learning. Jaxon reduces manual labeling requirements by 90% or more, accelerating the process by months and slashing the cost by over 75%. Augmenting this small amount of labeled data using traditional and cutting-edge machine learning algorithms, Jaxon provides huge quantities of labeled training data as well as fully-trained, highly-accurate models that can immediately be used for text classification. Jaxon also adapts to change as fast as data comes in, allowing models to be retrained as often and as quickly as needed to maintain and improve accuracy.
technology_description: Data is fed into Jaxon through an elaborate assembly line that dissects, analyzes, and refines itself on the fly. Jaxon dives into the data, discovers correlations, and looks for patterns and connections. Dozens of algorithms work together to assign the best possible labels to the original data. Jaxon is a machine learning solution, focused on training machines to more accurately process raw text. Using a combination of unsupervised and semi-supervised learning, Jaxon generates a neural “meta-learning” model, used to label text and synthesize training data. Through Jaxon’s Studio, users can curate the model(s), impart constraints, and iteratively tune the pipelines to optimize the performance of the downstream machine learning model being trained.

name: JEEVA WIRELESS, INC. Edit
elevator_pitch: Jeeva is a 5-year old, early-stage, deep-tech spinout from the University of Washington. We’re building an edge-to-cloud service platform, deploying high-volume disposable and battery-free streaming wireless sensors that gather real-time intelligence from item-level products directly at point of use and throughout distribution. By gathering intelligence on parameters such as consumption rate, environmental conditions, inventory location and velocity we automate processes like inventorying and
description: Jeeva is building an edge-to-cloud service platform, deploying high-volume disposable and battery-free streaming wireless sensors that gather real-time intelligence from item-level products directly at point of use and throughout distribution.
technology_description: Backed by a portfolio of 24 issued and pending patents, our backscatter networking technology employs reflected RF energy to wirelessly transmit data using three orders of magnitude (1000x) less energy than any existing radio technology. This breakthrough approach dramatically lowers the cost (100x) and size (10x) requirements for remote wireless sensor deployment. Using standard local networking protocols, our system leverages commodified, low-cost receivers and obviates the need for new infrastructure. Our turn-key platform provides everything necessary to deploy and manage very-large-scale sensor networks enabling up to 65,000 endpoints with a range of up to 200 meters between wired access points. The system is capable of continuously streaming up to a megabit per second while using less than a 100 microwatts of endpoint power. We combine this backscatter technique with multi-mode energy harvesting capabilities (RF, thermal, kinetic, PV) to create extremely low-cost, “forever sensors” that are completely battery and maintenance-free. This technology enables cheap, disposable sensors to bring real-time data from sources and locations never before possible. And we can do this with no latency or duty-cycle down-time, as is the case with all other competing IoT Wireless technologies.

description: Established in the fall of 2010 in Cambridge, MA, NuVu is an award winning full-time innovation studio for high school students. NuVu’s pedagogy is based on the architectural studio model and geared around multi-disciplinary, collaborative projects. NuVu provides students the opportunity to work collaboratively with academic and professional experts (PhDs/alumni from MIT and Harvard as well as leading professionals) to solve real-world problems. NuVu nurtures creative problem solving, team collaboration across networks, oral and presentation skills, technological proficiency, systems thinking, adaptability, risk-taking and imagination; All critical for student success in the 21st century. NuVu’s pedagogy is informed by the architectural design Studio where a coach guides students in hands-on problem-solving to solve complex, comprehensive problems. The Studio model uses exercises to build skills and integrates students’ knowledge in a final project. Within each multidisciplinary Studio, students explore problems rigorously by focusing on one project for two weeks. A Studio Coach mentors students to develop their project through an iterative process over the course of the Studio. Students confront the small and large contexts within problems as they are exposed to complex, ‘messy’ situations. The NuVu Team continuously evaluates students through deskcrits and final reviews. Develop Real-World Solutions for the World -- Taught within the multidisciplinary framework of the design Studio rather than traditional subjects, NuVu students acquire a highly personalized understanding of the world and how they relate to it and can fully participate in it. They develop multiple solutions to problems and learn the importance of moving from one solution to the next, combining, exploring and thinking of the possibilities. They also learn how to change their perspective on an issue quickly. They learn that solutions depend on perspective, and only by understanding an issue from multiple perspectives can they fully explore the terrain of possibilities. Iterative Process, Constant Feedback -- The iterative process, or process of refining an idea, product or solution, in the design studio is intended to provide students with continual feedback from NuVu Coaches and Staff on performance as well as product. NuVu students also experience working in an intense, feedback-rich environment that provides them with information and support for continuous self-evaluation, reflection, and improvement. Learn in New Ways -- NuVu challenges students to learn in new ways: analytical thinkers are inspired to explore their creative selves, while creative students expand their capacity to think and learn analytically. NuVu capitalizes on the immense resources of the Massachusetts Institute of Technology and Harvard University to focus on hands-on problem solving, encourage an inventive culture, promote peer teaching and learning, and cultivate students’ curiosity. Portfolio-Based Assessment -- Instead of grading, NuVu uses a portfolio-based assessment. A portfolio serves as a compilation of student work done at NuVu over the course of the term, semester or full year and is meant to show the student's growth over time and development of key academic and life skills (creativity, critical thinking, collaboration, communication, research, quantitative reasoning and analysis). Each NuVu student is provided with their own online profile on NuVu's online platform where they document and present their work. At frequent periods during the term, NuVu's team works with the student to assess how far the student has developed since the beginning of the term. The portfolio-based assessment helps make learning and assessment relevant to students' lives.
technology_description: At the core of JumpStream products is the ability to leverage and connect technology that our customer already has. Both JumpToTV and JumpToPC pair the smartphone and television over a high-bandwidth p2p WiFi connection. The device is built on a dual-core ARM, Cortex-A7 SoC operating a Linux kernel which balances performance and cost. A dual-band, MIMO WiFi chipset provides sufficiently high datarate and range for in-home use, and maintains latency at <100ms even in high RF interference environments. Hardware components are manufactured with JumpStream partners in Shenzhen and assembled by promoter Greenway Appliances in Vadodara, Gujarat. The software stack is built in Node.js and content database (MongoDB and Elasticsearch) to offer high-speed and personalized user interfaces for every user. hosted on an encrypted AWS server. JumpStream uses proprietary, automated crawling tools built in Python to populate the content databases. User experiences are carefully designed based on the founding team's over 30 years of combined experience designing products and services for underserved communities. Our products are tailored for the entry-level tech consumers in India, but our technology is robust, reliable and continually evolving with the state-of-the-art.
