name: PURVALA BIOSCIENCE, INC. Edit
elevator_pitch: Pūrvala was founded in 2020 to develop and commercialize advanced biomimetic and biotechnology-based materials for the health and beauty markets. The company's core technologies are based on discoveries from the laboratory of company co-founder Dr. Bradley Olsen, Professor of Chemical Engineering at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT). Prof. Olsen is one of the world's leading experts on biofunctional and bioinspired materials employing polymer chemistry and protein engineering. The company uses cutting edge biotechnology and chemistry techniques to make innovative and high-performance health and beauty products. Our products are based on insights into biological structures and comprised of proteins, lipids, and other naturally occurring compounds and are inherently non-toxic and environmentally friendly. Pūrvala's initial focus is our technology platform for natural, high-performance, sustainable hair products including hair repair, shaping, and coloring.
description: The brand is built upon the coexistence of dichotomies: everyday and fantasy, tradition and innovation, design and versatility -- creating an elevated experience that defies trade-offs. Senreve believes women are multifaceted and can have it all -- no compromise necessary. Senreve was born when, as rising female professionals, we found ourselves in search of the perfect luxury handbag. The company was seeking something that was beautiful and feminine, but also versatile enough to keep up with our everyday lives. However, Senreve discovered most designer bags didn’t fully consider all of these needs, so we decided to take matters into their own hands. With Senreve, women are now free to go about their day with ease, empowered to better live their busy, modern lifestyles. From phone and wallet to laptop and lipstick -- finally a beautiful bag that knows how to multitask. What Senreve has created is a seamless blend of elegant design, impeccable quality and innovative construction. The bags are sleek, structured and designed to carry your life in style. They're also lightweight, travel-friendly and just as appropriate for a business meeting as they are for happy hour or brunch. Bags are made from 100% genuine Italian leather with a pebbled finish. Each bag is expertly handcrafted to look and feel soft and supple, structured yet lightweight, and durable and water-resistant. We’ve also invested heavily in a top quality micro-suede lining that most other brands deem too expensive to use. For us, a top-quality product begins with exceptional ingredients. Craftsmen constructing SENREVE bags today have worked with top luxury brands for over 50 years. They employ a difficult inside-out technique that only a few factories in the world are able to do. Senreve believes combining this master craftsmanship with design and innovation sets SENREVE apart as the future of luxury.
technology_description: Pūrvala’s technologies are based on high-performing bioinspired and biomimetic materials discovered in Prof. Olsen’s laboratory. Using advanced chemistry and biological tools, Prof. Olsen identifies highly-evolved and -functional natural compounds and elucidates the molecular structure that confers their high-performance characteristics. We then use the tools of chemistry and biotechnology to develop even more highly functional versions of these natural compounds. These new versions, however, retain the biocompatibility, lack of toxicity, and environmental friendliness of the naturally-occurring source materials. Pūrvala’s focus is a hair technology platform, initially for natural hair repair, shaping and coloring products. This technology is based on a custom-engineered protein that binds to keratin found in hair. When bioconjugated to a lipid, this patent-protected compound restores natural structure to damaged hair. We are also using this technology to produce a natural hair straightener and hair colorant using the natural pigment melanin as the coloring moiety.

elevator_pitch: Quaise enables the global clean energy transition by providing universal access to supercritical geothermal energy through disruptive drilling technology. The millimeter wave drilling system unlocks the largest source of power-dense clean energy on Earth. A game changer in the ongoing clean energy transition.

The technology is the only approach in the world with the potential to build geothermal wells at unprecedented depths and temperatures. By targeting depths up to 20 kilometers and temperatures up to 500 degrees Celsius, we will have the ability to build clean electric generation and heat distribution plants within a short distance of every major population and industrial center on the planet, at a fraction of the footprint of other renewables. name: QUANTISCOPE Edit
elevator_pitch: We enable seamless AI/ML cellular imaging analysis into therapeutic pipeline workflows to streamline hits, enhance optimization, extend patents, and ultimately save lives.
description: We are developing AI enterprise tools for the biotech industry. The historical preclinical development cycle in drug discovery employs assays for particular analytes, e.g. does a drug result in suppression of a metabolite. Instead of looking at specific data points to determine efficacy and toxicity of potential drugs, our image screening approach evaluates over a thousand cellular data points to determine performance and safety of drug libraries. We launched through the federal BARDA DRIVe program, based on our potential to scale this technology for broad use in response to global public health threats. Examples of impact application areas for our platform include: -Evaluating large drug libraries for optimal preclinical drug candidates. -Evaluating agricultural solutions to address impacts of climate change, e.g. soil remediation products for wildfire lands. -Measuring in vivo delivery of targeted therapeutics.
technology_description: Our phenotypIQ cloud-based solution allows researchers to access the power of AI backed image analysis through a plug-and-play process of microscopic image upload. Our product consists of phenotypic modeling informing the selection of optimal preclinical candidates for efficacy and safety. We are first offering a suite of enterprise tools, similar to how complimentary SaaS companies in the space have launched protein folding or AI library building platforms. With further model training, we will be primed for 1:1 co-development partnerships. The robustness of our machine learning models first developed at the Broad Institute are unique and powerful differentiators. We are uniquely innovating around particular approaches to image analysis that can scale across multiple types of biological experiments in unbiased form.

keywords: AI/ML, Drug discovery, Enterprise

name: QUANTUM NETWORK TECHNOLOGIES Edit
elevator_pitch: Quantum Network Technologies (Qunett) is at the forefront of revolutionizing quantum information technology by developing scalable quantum networking hardware to enable a global-scale quantum internet. As quantum devices emerge, the ability to transmit quantum information securely and efficiently over long distances will become crucial for the widespread implementation of applications. Our rack-mounted quantum memory system is the first quantum networking solution that can be directly scaled up
description: There is a critical gap in the quantum technology industry: the need for high-quality, scalable connectivity among quantum computers, sensors, and other devices. As quantum devices emerge, the ability to transmit quantum information securely and efficiently over long distances will become crucial for the widespread implementation of applications. Addressing this challenge is essential for realizing the promising potential of quantum technologies, including unprecedented computational power, superior communications security, and enhanced sensor accuracy. Qunett aims to address this need by developing scalable quantum networking hardware that integrates with existing infrastructure to enable the transmission of quantum information between linked devices. Our mission is to pioneer the development of the world’s first scalable and deployable quantum network, ushering in a new era for the global information grid. This vision begins with the interconnection of quantum computers, essential for tackling complex problems requiring more than a million qubits. With known engineering roadblocks to scaling up single quantum processors, it will be necessary to connect multiple QPUs and form quantum data centers, mirroring the approach used to build classical supercomputers. We plan to expand quantum networking capabilities to metropolitan-scale fiber optic networks, aiming to extend connectivity to even greater distances through satellite links. These networks will be able to connect various quantum devices, facilitating secure communication, enhancing precision measurements, and enabling navigation systems beyond traditional GPS.
technology_description: The two core challenges of building scalable quantum networks are sufficiently long storage of quantum states in memory and efficient distribution of high-fidelity entanglement. Qunett’s technology distinguishes itself with two strategies for overcoming these challenges. First, we utilize high-density, solid-state quantum memories based on fabricated diamond chips. By leveraging state-of-the-art semiconductor manufacturing techniques, we can densely pack small-footprint qubits, enabling the individual addressing of millions of qubits within a compact memory chip. Second, our approach to an entanglement source ensures the creation of entangled photon pairs using a method called zero-added-loss multiplexing. By generating many pairs of photons simultaneously and using the full spectral bandwidth without any added losses, we can achieve efficient entanglement generation and high transmission rates. With our hardware, we aim to enable efficient and scalable quantum networks, unlocking the full potential of quantum technologies and accelerating their timeline to practical applications.

name: QUERA COMPUTING, INC. Edit
elevator_pitch: QuEra Computing is using the neutral atom technology platform to build the most scalable, powerful, commercially relevant quantum computing capability in the industry.
description: Quantum computing is a cutting-edge technology redefining the limits of information processing. This transformation is powered by hardware whose smallest parts – quantum bits, or “qubits” – obey the laws of quantum mechanics, introducing innate probability and parallelism to computer programs. This impacts the speed of calculations, quality of solutions, and energy consumption needed to address some of today’s hardest problems. Finally, it opens the doors for new opportunities, sparking the search for novel problems and solutions that will shape the future needs of humankind. We share a single-minded commitment to extract practical use out of these emergent quantum devices.
technology_description: Technology includes: (1) Laser cooling enables <uK temperature without cryogenics; (2) Rydberg interactions allow high-fidelity, fast multi-qubit gates on selected qubits; and (3) Native qubit mappings minimize resource overhead

name: RAMONA OPTICS, INC. Edit
elevator_pitch: Current microscopes cannot capture images at high resolution over an area larger than a few square centimeters, which fundamentally limits what we are able to see and how quickly we are able to see it. At Ramona Optics, we are combining machine learning with novel optics to reinvent what is possible with a microscope.
description: High-throughput optical microscopy is transforming the science of modern biology -- from genetics to drug discovery to synthetic biology. It is rapidly improving efficiency and opening up new possibilities across a wide range of applications. But scientists today are fundamentally constrained by the limited perspective of traditional microscopes. As field-of-view increases, resolution decreases. Yet modern biology requires an ability to capture precise data across larger areas and at multiple points in time to understand dynamic systems and reduce costs by accelerating tedious workflows. Microscopy also has a data problem. Image data is incredibly large, but much of what’s captured is irrelevant negative space. Parsing through the data for insights is time-consuming and expensive. Ramona Opitcs is on a mission to expand the field-of-view for researchers, startups, and industry while preserving resolution and streamlining automated workflows.
technology_description: Ramona’s Micro-Camera Array Microscope (MCAM) is the first gigapixel microscope that can capture cellular-level detail over hundreds of square centimeters.

name: RAYSECUR INC. Edit
elevator_pitch: RaySecur is transforming security detection by delivering X-ray like imaging without harmful X-rays. Our patented T-ray imaging systems deliver real-time, 3D imaging of concealed items to detect more and smaller threats and contraband than conventional security screening systems. Today our solutions are deployed across four continents and are used by 4 of the 5 largest US corporations, in addition to governments and law enforcement to keep their people and critical assets safe.
description: RaySecur® is the leader in T-ray security imaging to detect concealed threats and contraband with MailSecur®, the world's first desktop T-ray screening system designated by the US Department of Homeland Security under the Safety Act as a Qualified Anti-Terror Technology. MailSecur delivers real-time, 3D video of contents concealed inside items without opening them and without ionizing radiation, unlike X-ray. RaySecur’s patented T-ray imaging systems are small, portable, and provide broad detection capabilities including weapons, explosives, chemical, biological, and even radiological agents, and is 300x more sensitive than X-ray to detect small quantities of powders and liquids, including drugs and drug-laced papers. MailSecur supports remote connectivity to RaySecur’s team of former military and law enforcement experts 24 x 365 for image analysis and support. RaySecur is trusted by Fortune 500 companies, government agencies, and heads of state to keep their staff and operations safe from concealed threats and contraband.
technology_description: RaySecur's patented terahertz (T-ray) imaging systems enables real-time, non-invasive imaging of concealed items. Unlike X-rays which generate ionizing radiation and static 2D images, T-rays are safe and enable live, 3D video imaging of contents concealed inside other items or packaging. RaySecur's proprietary optical systems leverage the world's most advanced multi-pixel terahertz detectors to deliver unparalleled imaging capabilities in a small, portable, desktop scanner. Image processing, enhancement, and analysis is supported by advanced software algorithms and artificial intelligence models.

name: REACH LABS (FORMERLY SUPPLY, INC.) Edit
elevator_pitch: Reach builds safe, affordable wireless power networks with ranges comparable to WiFi. Reach envisions a future in which wireless power networks are as prevalent as portable batteries and wireless communications today. Reach's initial product deployments are in the industrial sector.
description: Reach builds wireless power networks with ranges comparable to WiFi. Power is transferred from a transmitting "router" to receivers over-the-air through carefully guided radio-waves, the same wave technology used by WiFi. Reach's system capitalizes on wave reflections to optimally deliver energy to receivers, even in non-line-of-sight cases. The fundamental design of the system allows it to distribute power effectively while complying with all IEEE and FCC exposure recommendations. Although wireless power is useful for almost all portable devices, Reach is deploying its technology to power industrial wireless sensors and process controllers as a beachhead market, enabling wireless sensor performances and applications previously prohibited by battery life.

name: REALTIME ROBOTICS Edit
elevator_pitch: Realtime Robotics expands the potential of automation. Its RapidPlan software generates collision-free motion plans in milliseconds for industrial robots. Its solution empowers robots to function together in unstructured and collaborative workspaces, as well as to react to dynamic obstacles the instant changes are perceived. Its solutions expand the potential of automation.
description: Realtime Robotics was founded to transform automation with flexible robot control capabilities, built on its innovative, real-time collision-free motion planning technology. Realtime’s products enable single or multiple robots to operate autonomously at full speed in unstructured and uncaged environments. With Realtime, industrial robots can be deployed, updated and/or re-deployed with minimal programming. Its technology empowers companies to automate more processes by removing engineering complexity and reducing cycle time, lowering overall expenses, increasing throughput, driving greater operational efficiency and significantly improving ROI.
technology_description: Realtime Robotics RapidPlan software autonomously creates and choreographs all robot movements and removes the need for brand-specific robot programming. Within the software environment, users simply click on robots and target points to visualize task plans, saving weeks to months of programming time per project. The same software provides the simulation environment and controls real robots. Cell modeling, task planning, programming and operations are all handled within the same workflow tool. The motions in simulation and as-built reality match, dramatically speeding up the design and deployment processes. With any changes, such as geometry or robot locations, automated robot paths remain collision-free, giving manufacturers highly-flexible, multipurpose workcells. RapidPlan adapts to changing environments, either using the information from PLCs (programmable logic controllers) or from dedicated 3D sensors. For example, bin picking has traditionally been a challenging application for a multi-robot setup. Users don’t know the exact part location for picking, making it challenging to predict an accurate collision-free path for multiple robots that are completing tasks in the same area. With RapidPlan, robot space reservations are released in real time as soon as the robot moves to another location, dramatically improving cycle time or other parameters that users prioritize. During the on-site physical validation stage, a manufacturer typically needs to have a highly-skilled team working after hours to manually run through every move combination, ensuring seamless operations on the live factory floor. Because RapidPlan inherently produces collision-free paths, it reduces the need to verify against potential collisions - resulting in significant time savings. RapidPlan helps manufacturers have peace of mind in a high-stress and tight space environment, where every minute of downtime is expensive. It is easy to make a mistake, such as grabbing the wrong teach pendant and jogging the robot in the wrong direction, causing a collision. RapidPlan will alert the user of any potential collision beforehand, so steps can be taken to prevent it. If a cycle is interrupted for any reason, the user can easily and quickly return the robots to their home poses without needing to individually jog them home.

technology_description: AI chip architects often overlook advanced deep learning features and requirements because they believe software stacks between their silicon and algorithms can provide effective abstract layers. However, we disagree. We believe that naively designed chips cannot efficiently utilize expensive custom silicon resources, and that enabling more native hardware support leads to higher performance. Rebellions Inc is building genuine AI accelerators by bi-directionally bridging the gap between underlying silicon architectures and deep learning algorithms. We push algorithm boundaries to better exploit silicon budgets, while re-architecting AI processors to incorporate sophisticated deep learning features through silicon-dedicated DL kernels.

name: REFUSE Edit
elevator_pitch: ReFuse runs recyclables collection shops, sells recyclables to industries and rewards those who contributed with their waste. Our vision is a zero waste society that channels resources to empower communities. Born in Lebanon, the social enterprise deploys reverse-vending points, allowing underserved urban areas to start recycling, and get rewarded for it. Through its operating software, ReFuse monitors transactions, engages users and trades over 21 types of materials. With a basin of more than 7
description: In Lebanon, solid waste has overwhelmed local governments and threatened communities’ health for decades. Garbage is everywhere, vulnerable communities are most exposed to its hazards. Setting up viable, accessible services continues to be a challenge in dense, underserved communities. To date, around 20% of the waste is recovered, out of which 6% reaches recycling facilities, 36% is landfilled, and 44% is dumped in 940+ uncontrolled scattered dumps, threatening the lives of the inhabitants. The annual cost of environmental degradation is increasing annually reaching 4.4% of GDP, equivalent to $2.3 billion. All this, in a country where financial collapse and political negligence resulted in a total disintegration of people’s resources. Lebanese saw their assets plunge together with the value of the local currency. Unemployment is on the rise, and indebtedness too. After two years of crisis, the population below the poverty line reached 82%, adding to the social complexity of the nation with the world-highest refugee per capita rate. While strongly relying on external materials, Lebanon struggles to import due to the currency depreciation, therefore being in dire need of recyclables to fill in the resource gap. Lebanese industries ask for local raw materials to fuel their production.
technology_description: Our MVP software was built on web 2.0 and is vital for redistributing value throughout the supply-demand chain. Hence, the IT solution implemented serves as a link between volumes of recyclables from those who produced them and those who recycle them, allowing a proportional share of revenues. Besides, it also helps our users monitor their drop-offs, and our team surveys statistics like changing patterns of trash collected, customers’ databases and the impact of our service. ReFuse aims to invest in its tech infrastructure by shifting the development to web 3.0: enabling climate intelligence. This upgrade will be demonstrated in our application offering autonomous technologies like AI and IoT solutions and will enhance our understanding of waste production dynamics, digitize infrastructure and other smart optimizing features.

name: REGENT CRAFT INC Edit
elevator_pitch: REGENT builds seagliders, a new mode of transportation that will redefine regional mobility by 2025. Seagliders are all-electric, hydrofoiling boat-planes that operate within a wingspan of the water's surface. By flying low on a cushion of air, seagliders unlock the ability to fly twice as far as an electric aircraft, while being regulated by maritime authorities enabling market entry for a fraction of the cost. REGENT, a team of 34, has accumulated $7B in provisional orders (including firm deposits) and has raised $30M to date from the likes of Founders Fund and Hawaiian Airlines.
description: We develop & manufacture all-electric, passenger-carrying, wing-in-ground-effect vehicles to service coastal routes, building on real-world-proven tech. Our new category of vehicle, the seaglider, is a wing-in-ground-effect craft that operates in three modes of operation: floating on its hull, high-speed foiling on a hydrofoil, and flight in ground effect within a wingspan of the water's surface. Seagliders operate exclusively over the water to drastically reduce the time and cost of moving people and goods between coastal cities.​ Built to the same safety standards of all modern aircraft and watercraft, the seaglider will service routes up to 180 miles with existing battery technology, and routes up to 500 miles with next-gen batteries, all using existing dock infrastructure.
technology_description: There are four technologies that are critical to enabling seaglider operations and safety​ which REGENT is either inventing, or utilizing in a novel way. These are a digital flight control system, hydrofoils with active actuation, all-electric propulsion and a "blown wing". All these technologies are unlocked by battery technology.

name: REJUVENATE BIO Edit
elevator_pitch: Rejuvenate Bio is targeting the core drivers of chronic age-related diseases. Approach: Aging is caused by a change in gene expression in the body that manifests itself in age related disease. Age-related disease represents a $1.5T opportunity in the USA healthcare system, which has unsustainably quadrupled spending on healthcare as a % of GDP since 1960. Rejuvenate Bio utilizes proprietary gene therapy, targets, and tools to target these changes in gene expression. Its first efforts have d
description: Moving gene therapy beyond rare disorders.
technology_description: We are leveraging technologies that turn the liver into a therapeutic bio-factory, ensuring long-term, steady, and sustained delivery of our proteins into the systemic circulation. AAV is an ideal tool for safe gene delivery. DNA delivered with AAV is maintained as an extrachromosomal episome and does not integrate into the genome. Gene delivery with AAV has been demonstrated to provide long term gene expression in the human liver up to and beyond 10 years. AAVs are naturally very effective at targeting the liver. By targeting the liver, we can leverage the secreted nature of our proteins to create systemic changes. This allows us to move beyond “fixing” the defective gene in monogenic disorders to secreting proteins critical in cellular function to thereby enhance function. We utilize key pathways that stretch across multiple indications Our results show sustainable decrease in inflammation and fibrosis without turning off key pathways. Treatment has shown ability to treat three types of heart failure and metabolic disease across small and large animals.

name: RELATIVITY6, INC. Edit
elevator_pitch: Relativity6 helps organizations better engage with their customers using machine learning technology. Our automated software platform of proprietary Behavioral Listening algorithms analyzes various internal and external data sources to find hidden patterns and make predictions about future individual and company purchasing behaviors. Our technology optimizes win-back, churn detection/prevention, cross/up-sell, and net new acquisition use cases.
description: Relativity6, Inc. develops predictive statistical models, machine learning algorithms, and randomized field experiments tailored specifically to discover ways to bring back lapsed customers. Its statistical models utilize unresponsive customer transaction, behavioral, demographic, and digital footprint data to predict which customers are willing to return to a client’s business; estimate the value of each high potential unresponsive customer by predicting their second lifetime value; and run various randomized real-time field experiments. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is based in Cambridge, Massachusetts. While at MIT, the two founders co-wrote a masters thesis on ways to decode the silence of unresponsive customers. The result was Relativity6, a machine learning startup focused on reactivating lapsed customers. Current customers include West Elm, ZipCar, Citibank as well as many others.

name: RESONANCE SIGNATURES, LLC Edit
elevator_pitch: Counterfeit, substandard, or contaminated consumables (e.g. food items, dietary supplements) are a major worldwide problem; global economic trends and the rapidly increasing volume of online purchases are creating untrusted supply chains for such products. Today, about 30% of such items have compositions that don’t match their labels, and a significant fraction are contaminated by compounds with adverse health consequences. High-value items such as packaged medicines are also highly prone to fraud. Our company is developing innovative chemometric authentication devices based on nuclear quadrupole resonance (NQR) spectroscopy that have the potential to significantly mitigate contamination and fraud of consumables in the modern supply chain.
description: Trust is becoming an increasingly important factor in the lifecycle of consumables, from medicine to dietary supplements and diverse food products. According to World Health Organization (WHO), one out of 10 medicines in developing countries are falsified. There is also an epidemic of synthetic opioids being transported through the international mail system. There is a critical need to develop low-cost, reliable and non-invasive authentication method for consumables. We have designed a novel, reliable, and effective authentication method for consumables by sensing their unique chemical signatures using nuclear quadrupole resonance (NQR) spectroscopy.
technology_description: Our approach allows a product or package to be authenticated at any stage of the supply chain using a portable NQR spectrometer and a computing device (e.g. a smart phone) that runs a customized application. A manufacturer needs to store the NQR signatures of the ingredients being used for product authentication in a cloud server (preferably in encrypted form to avoid data theft) before forwarding the product to later stages in the supply chain. The cloud server can be used to protect and control the access of tag information from unauthorized users. It can also be used for defending against common attacks like eavesdropping and man-in-the- middle attacks. This integrity verification step can either be used to authenticate the package and/or to trace it back to a manufacturer. As the NQR signatures are extremely hard to duplicate, the ingredients under test (known as chemical tags) can be used to check for different integrity issues, e.g., adulteration, mislabeling, and contamination. In case of authentication failure at any stage, the product can be brought to the attention of the manufacturer and/or regulatory authorities and appropriate measures can be taken.
mit_connection: MIT alumni as founder | Resonance Signatures was co-founded by Dr. Soumyajit Mandal, who is an MIT alumnus (M.S. 2004, Ph.D. 2009, Course 6).
contact: 2649 NW 136th Terrace, Gainesville, FL, 32606 • soumya@alum.mit.edu, startupexchange-admin@mit.edu, startupexchange@mit.edu
keywords: Materials authentication, verification, product integrity and safety, NQR spectroscopy

name: REYNKO INC. Edit
elevator_pitch: ReynKo is systematically addressing the world’s most pressing technical challenges concerning turbulent fluid flows with software, modeling, and hardware solutions. ReynKo’s founder and CEO, Justin Beroz, derived an exact physical theory for turbulent fluids that redresses the longstanding “turbulence problem” and provides the foundation for ReynKo’s technical development.
description: The turbulent motion of fluids plays an intimate role in our lives and our world. It drives the earth’s weather and climate patterns, produces drag on planes and cars, restricts flow in pipeline networks, and more. Today, approximately one-third of global energy consumption is specifically devoted to overcoming turbulent resistance across a myriad of applications. Yet, the scientific theory of turbulence is incomplete and remains the oldest unsolved problem in classical physics. Our limited ability to understand and model turbulent flows has resulted in only small and incremental technical advances over the past century.
technology_description: Justin Beroz, ReynKo’s founder and CEO, derived an exact physical theory that describes turbulent fluid flows as part of his doctoral research in physics at MIT. This work constitutes the company’s foundation for technical developments aimed at systematically addressing the world’s most pressing matters regarding turbulent fluids. ReynKo is currently focused on developing accurate turbulence models and related software code to enable predictive computational fluid dynamics simulations. Following this success, ReynKo will pursue critical modeling applications and develop hardware systems for turbulence suppression.
mit_connection: MIT student as founder | Prof. John W. M. Bush (MIT Math Dept.) is my PhD advisor for the turbulence modeling work, and is a Scientific Advisor to ReynKo.
contact: justin@reynko.com, startupexchange-admin@mit.edu, startupexchange@mit.edu
keywords: fluid turbulence, weather & climate modeling, energy infrastructure, Transportation, Aerospace, CFD, modeling software

name: ROUTABLE AI Edit
elevator_pitch: Routable AI is an early stage start-up from Boston spun out of MIT. Through 4 years of Mathematics and Computer Science research, we have built an advanced technology to route shared cars and shuttles on-demand with high efficiency and convenience for the rider. We enable the next generation of applications like UberPool and ViaVan. This time without the massive increase in travel time for riders, the unfair pay for the drivers, and the resulting congestions in cities. Our technology not only applies to cars with a capacity for 3 passengers, but also for larger capacity vehicles such as shuttles and buses (shared by around 12 passengers simultaneously). Think of this as push a button, get a shuttle. And it works extremely well. In a study, we showed that by using our technology we could serve all of the approximately 0.5M daily taxi rides in NYC with 80% less vehicles, while guaranteeing a high level of passenger convenience. Over the past year we have gained the attention of high level former Uber executives. Some of them have joined Routable AI with the mission to get ride-sharing right this time around. We are planning to deliver on the original promise of ride-sharing, which is to provide an alternative to a private car, alleviate congestion in cities, and to provide passengers with an affordable ride that is more convenient than public transit.

name: RRTC Edit
elevator_pitch: RRTC has a low-temperature process to fabricate polymer-ceramic composite (PCCs). RRTC composites are a carbon-negative, lightweight, high-performance alternative to conventional carbon-positive materials such as wood, metals, ceramics, polymers, and fiber-reinforced resins. PCCs are manufactured in one step using RRTC's patented net-[size+shape] process at a cost far less than any commercial advanced composite material. RRTC is interested in meeting strategic partners interested in transitioning their businesses to carbon-neutral, sustainable materials that outperform their incumbent ones. RRTC also wants to meet investors interested in a cleantech venture whose products are profitable with or without 45Q.
description: Polymer-ceramic composites are limited in structure and chemistry by the processes used to bond them together. In order to form a continuous polycrystalline ceramic network, ceramics require high processing temperatures (>1000˚C). Unfortunately, polymers decompose at temperatures of 400˚C or lower. This temperature disparity prevents ceramic and polymer networks from being co-processed in a single step. Instead, time-consuming multi-step processes are required lasting days and even months. The raw materials are typically costly and difficult to obtain in large quantities, limiting these materials to low volume, value-added applications instead of having utility for the mainstream materials market.
technology_description: RRTC uses a patented process called Low-Temperature Solidification (LTS) to manufacture polymer-ceramic composites. LTS creates the ceramic bond at temperatures less than or equal to those required to process polymers, enabling a broad range of polymer-ceramic compositions and novel materials properties. Aqueous solutions infiltrate and react with porous particulate ceramic networks, producing a continuous network that fills the pore space. This process creates small and large shapes of varying complexity without dimensional shrinkage. Simultaneously, polymer particles are co-processed to form a co-continuous network.
mit_connection: MIT alumni as founder | MIT, Ph.D., 1987, DMSE (Course III)

keywords: Polymer-ceramic composites, Materials, cleantech, Greentech, Carbon-negative, CO2, CCUS, carbon capture, utilization, and storage

name: SAATHI Edit
elevator_pitch: The first 100% eco-friendly sanitary pad made from waste banana tree fiber locally sourced for urban and rural India. Saathi is empowering rural women to improve their lives and communities through low-cost, locally manufactured sanitary pads.
description: Saathi is empowering rural women to improve their lives and communities through low-cost, locally manufactured sanitary pads. THE PROBLEM -- A silent malady is crippling over 200 million women living in rural India. These women, aged between 12 and 47, are precluded from freely engaging in and contributing to their communities simply because they lack access to affordable sanitary protection. The implications are real – every year, many of these rural girls and women miss up to 50 days of work or school. Many school age girls either fall behind or drop out of school entirely. Along with economic challenges, cultural stigmas prevent many women from easily accessing safe sanitary protection, especially in the most rural Indian communities. More alarmingly, many of these women resort to using less hygienic alternatives such as rags to meet their need for sanitary protection, risking infection. Rudimentary forms of sanitary protection can lead to serious infections. This problem is not limited to India but is global problem that affects women in many parts of the world. The three main barries to rural women using pads are: (*) Affordability: Current sanitary pads in the market are not affordable. (*) Availabilty: Multinations do not have viable distribution channels in rural parts of the world. (*) Awareness: Many rural women are uneducated about the benefits of proper feminine hygiene practices. THE SAATHI SOLUTION -- In order to address this pressing healthcare issue, Saathi has developed a small scale manufacturing process to produce affordable sanitary protection from waste banana tree fiber. These pads will be manufactured and sold by local women. Saathi works with rural women to sell the pads door-to-door, in order to provide customers with in-person health education opportunities. Saathi's major innovation lies in the development of its small scale, modular manufacturing solution. The Saathi machine, which is actually an integrated chain of individual modules working together, takes inputs of the absorbent fiber pulp, spun-bonded polypropylene and hygienic-grade polyethylene and outputs a folded, sterilized sanitary pad complete with wings and adhesives for undergarment attachments.
mit_connection: MIT alumni as founder | CEO - Kristin P Kagetsu (kagetsu@alum.mit.edu), S.B., Mechanical Engineering. Advisor - Grace Kane, S.B., Mechanical & Ocean Engineering.
contact: Ahmedabad, GujaratINDIA, Ahmedabad, Gujarat, 380054 • saathi@saathipads.com, startupexchange-admin@mit.edu, startupexchange@mit.edu

name: SAFEMODE Edit
elevator_pitch: SafeMode offers behavior-based software to help fleet operators monitor and reward drivers for safe and eco-driving.
description: Indigo Technologies, Inc. (formerly Nucleus Scientific) is a Cambridge, MA-based technology company focused on revolutionizing the cost, performance, and efficiency of electric mobility. Founded in 2010 by MIT professor Ian Hunter, Indigo employs over 30 engineers and scientists with expertise spanning mechanical, electrical, computer systems, aerospace and ocean engineering. The team’s impressive academic credentials include 10 PhDs and 18 Masters’ degrees. Indigo has matured several motor, battery, and wireless charging technologies and emerged from stealth in 2019 to bring these advances to market. Indigo has coupled all these technologies into several road-ready electric vehicle concepts used for testing, validation, and demonstration. The team’s attention to detail and ability to develop disruptive solutions from first-principles permeates the design of these systems. Well equipped facilities allow the team to move concepts from design to prototype quickly.
technology_description: SafeMode's revolutionary technology allows drivers to be rewarded based on their personal improvement and efficiency. This is adjustable based on the fleet's goals and can combine several parameters such as safety, efficiency, texting, fatigue, and more. SafeMode's technology combines state-of-the-art AI with proprietary Behavioral Economics models, which profiles drivers for accurate assessment of the most effective feedback, personalized incentives, and positive user interaction and engagement. Smart incentive algorithms determine the optimal cost-effective monetary and non-monetary incentives for a given driver at any given time. Rewarding is not a new concept; fleet managers make use of scorecards and bonuses to reward drivers. However, without understanding how to incentive in the right way, they are wasting money with no result or even worse, they are incentivizing the wrong behavior instead of the right ones. The premise behind the technology is that what does not get measured does not get managed, and what does not get incentivized does not get achieved. With no need for hardware, the implementation is seamless and user-friendly for drivers and fleet managers alike. The platform aggregates multi-source data from existing devices in the vehicles to create a comprehensive context of the trip, including normalizing routes, weather, and traffic, which increase the driver's trustworthiness in the system.

name: SAFI BIOTHERAPEUTICS Edit
elevator_pitch: Safi Biotherapeutics is a pre-clinical stage blood cell therapy company developing biomanufactured red blood cells (mRBCs) with targeted immuno-phenotyping for multi-unit, blood transfusions, both chronic (sickle cell, thalassemias, and chemo-related anemia) and acute (trauma and surgeries).
description: Blood shortages now occuring with increased frequency (and not just during COVID pandemic, the shortages are continuing in 2024), so alternatives to donor blood products are needed. But not having the right supply of typed (i.e. specific antigen profile) blood is a bigger problem for patients who have somewhat rare blood types and/or are regularly transfused and therefore develop "alloimmunization", in which antibodies are formed to antigens (proteins) on the surface of the donor blood cells which they themselves are lacking. They need very specific typed red blood cells for safe and effective transfusions.
technology_description: People been growing blood cells in vitro from stem cell sources in small amounts (and/or larger amounts very expensively), but with Safi's technology innovations and trade secrets we are at the point where we can manufacture RBCs at multi-unit scale and viable economics for transfusion.

name: SAFI ORGANICS Edit
elevator_pitch: Safi Organics produces a carbon-negative soil conditioner derived from biomass (farm) waste designed for rural smallholder farmers, leading to a 30% increase in crop yield and 50% increase in income by reversing soil degradation. Safi Sarvi(R) increases a farmer's yields while reducing soil acidity. Our product is suitable for a variety of agriculture and horticulture including: maize, rice, wheat, beans, peas, vegetables, fruits, flowers, and grasses.
description: Safi Organics produces a carbon-negative soil conditioner derived from biomass (farm) waste designed for rural smallholder farmers, leading to a 30% increase in crop yield and 50% increase in income by reversing soil degradation. Biomass waste is present in most rural farms every year after harvest, and yet most of this waste is burned in open air rather than economically utilized because existing capital-intensive/centralized processing technologies often require the long-distance transport of this waste, which is very expensive. We have developed patent-pending environmentally friendly reactors and unique recipes enabling the low-cost and decentralized conversion of waste into carbon-negative soil conditioner in under 2 hours. Our EcoCert-certified product is already sold to more than 80 acres of land, with highly positive customer reviews. In addition, this product actively sequesters 1.5 tons/acre of CO2 into the soil per planting season, directly mitigating climate change. Africa’s rural farmers often pay much more than the rest of the world for fertilizers because most fertilizers are produced at a large scale abroad and then imported. This adds to the cost of food production for small-scale subsistence farmers, driving them into a vicious cycle of poverty. We offer these farmers a unique fertilizer blend, tailored to the African soil, at a lower cost compared to the market cost. This helps break smallholder farmers’ current dependency on expensive imported chemical fertilizers, which are actually harming their acidic soil in the long run. We have developed a proprietary formula and an innovation reactor to enable this process.

name: SANDBOX CARBON INC. Edit
elevator_pitch: Sandbox Carbon is developing The Carbon Dumpster, a system that captures CO2 emissions at the point of emission at small and medium commercial properties. The Carbon Dumpster connects directly to fossil fuel burning appliances such as furnaces, boilers, and hoods and scrubs the CO2 from their exhaust. The system consists of a series of cartridges that can be selectively arranged in parallel and series to scale and meet the demands of every customer. We currently have built a prototype of a single cartridge and are working to optimize its design before building multiple. We plan to have a decarbonized diesel generator operational by the end of 2024.
description: Sandbox Carbon is helping businesses lower their carbon footprint. Businesses may be looking to become more sustainable for a variety of reasons but the most common we are seeing is pressure from stakeholders such investors or employees, demands from customers, pressure from regulators, or genuine alarm about the climate crisis. Unfortunately, decarbonizing the built environment can be very challenging and expensive, especially as a retrofit. The Carbon Dumpster is a more cost effective way to retrofit a building and make it more sustainable. Furthermore, the technology is installed on-premises, making the intervention much more transparent to relevant stakeholders and it directly captures scope one emissions so there is no need for the complexity and risk of purchasing carbon offsets.
technology_description: Our technology takes well established chemistry, the lime calcination process, and packages it into a modular system that can be easily deployed for our customers. The system consists of a series of cartridges that can scrub the CO2 from the exhaust of fossil fuel burning appliances. The cartridges are modular and can be connected in series or in parallel to scale and meet the demands of each customer. There are a number of technical innovations necessary to achieve this goal and we are developing protectable intellectual property. There are two main areas of innovation necessary. The first is the need to have a massive surface area to maximize reactivity while minimizing the pressure drop across the cartridge. The second is a system that can be easily loaded and unloaded given the changes the materials undergo as they react with CO2.
mit_connection: MIT alumni as founder | Both founders are alum. Aaron Rose, 6-2 BE, 2017 David Griggs, 2 ME, 2021

name: SANGTERA, INC. Edit
elevator_pitch: We are building a new type of electric motor/actuator with 10x the power density and 100x the torque density of the existing motor. It also has high precision, built- in torque sensing, high responsiveness, and does not use rare-earth materials. The technology has been demonstrated in lab prototypes for DARPA.
description: High-speed high-precision pick-and-place / semiconductor companies needing to perform high-volume 3d die-stacking operations
technology_description: Our actuator is an electro-static actuator utilizing electro-wetting effect. The unit-cell is formed with a stator layer made of micro-fabricated electrodes, covered with dielectric layer and hydrophobic layer, and rotor layer made of micro-fabricated structure anchoring water droplets with lithographically defined hydrophilic and hydrophobic regions. Multiple layers can be stacked to provide higher force. The electrodes can be shrunk further, increasing the packaging density of water droplets, thereby increasing the total force.

name: SATELLITE BIOSCIENCES Edit
elevator_pitch: Satellite Bio is a late-stage preclinical company developing a curative therapy for severe liver disease. We have a sustainable, scalable cell source of human hepatocytes (liver cells) that we stabilize in the form of tissue seeds. These tissue seeds can be shipped frozen to location of use. Upon administration they grow to form satellite liver tissue that can alleviate the metabolic burden caused by a diseased liver.
description: In the US along there are over 500,000 patients with chronic liver disease. Only 8,000 will receive a liver transplants, leaving the vast majority without a cure. Patients with severe liver disease suffer from hepatic insufficiency. We address that by augmenting their liver function with satellite liver tissue that engrafts and provides metabolic support to the diseased liver.
technology_description: We have discovered a way to grow and stabilize hepatocytes (liver cells) while maintaining their mature, adult function. These stabilized hepatocytes can be stored and shipped. After implantation they integrate into tissue while maintaining their viability and function.

description: The brand is built upon the coexistence of dichotomies: everyday and fantasy, tradition and innovation, design and versatility -- creating an elevated experience that defies trade-offs. Senreve believes women are multifaceted and can have it all -- no compromise necessary. Senreve was born when, as rising female professionals, we found ourselves in search of the perfect luxury handbag. The company was seeking something that was beautiful and feminine, but also versatile enough to keep up with our everyday lives. However, Senreve discovered most designer bags didn’t fully consider all of these needs, so we decided to take matters into their own hands. With Senreve, women are now free to go about their day with ease, empowered to better live their busy, modern lifestyles. From phone and wallet to laptop and lipstick -- finally a beautiful bag that knows how to multitask. What Senreve has created is a seamless blend of elegant design, impeccable quality and innovative construction. The bags are sleek, structured and designed to carry your life in style. They're also lightweight, travel-friendly and just as appropriate for a business meeting as they are for happy hour or brunch. Bags are made from 100% genuine Italian leather with a pebbled finish. Each bag is expertly handcrafted to look and feel soft and supple, structured yet lightweight, and durable and water-resistant. We’ve also invested heavily in a top quality micro-suede lining that most other brands deem too expensive to use. For us, a top-quality product begins with exceptional ingredients. Craftsmen constructing SENREVE bags today have worked with top luxury brands for over 50 years. They employ a difficult inside-out technique that only a few factories in the world are able to do. Senreve believes combining this master craftsmanship with design and innovation sets SENREVE apart as the future of luxury.

name: SEE TO SOLVE, LLC Edit
elevator_pitch: See to Solve is a boot-strapped Enterprise SaaS company with two launched products (Flow & Alert) focused on mapping/improving business processes and real-time alerts/responses to drive operational excellence in the enterprise. See to Solve has revenue, renewing customers (GSK, Intel/Solidigm, UMassMemorial Health, Baptist Memorial Health, Charleston Area Medical Center) and a growing pipeline of prospects and partners.
description: FLOW enables business architects to design, visualize, and analyze processes with information-rich workflow maps, and collaborate, real-time to improve them. This is a cloud-based collaboration tool purpose built for the modern and distributed workforce. ALERT empowers front-line staff with mobile-first problem reporting, delivers faster problem resolution and provides digital dashboards for organization-wide visibility and continuous improvement. This is a responsive web-based application built for desktop/laptop, mobile and tablets and offers the easiest way to report a problem in an organization. The tool is intuitive and simple to use and there are specific modules for the reporter, the responder and the manager, along with rich reporting, dashboards and integrations with other enterprise systems.
technology_description: Human intellect—individual and collective—is super powerful when it can solve problems slowly deliberately, and with chance of iterative learning by doing (or more rigorously from experimentation). It gets overwhelmed when it has to solve new hard problems, on the fly. That’s when ships crash, patients get hurt, factories shut down, and development projects go into disarray. ALERT provides a distributed (and mobile) workforce quick and easy capability to call out when its established routines are getting overwhelmed, so work has to kick out of fast paced execution into another round of planning and preparation. In that planning and vetting phase, FLOW makes it quick and easy to map complex enterprise processes (technical standards etc. embedded to avoid have to go to wikis, manuals, knowledge bases, etc.) so the 'slow thinking' planning of complex processes is way more effective.

elevator_pitch: Chemical fertilizers support food production for half of the global population. Yet their production causes a significant portion of greenhouse gas emissions, and their use destroys native soil microbiomes. Many have worked to develop microbial fertilizers to circumvent these issues, but the microbes needed are delicate and difficult to manufacture. Seia Bio has developed a self-assembling coating that protects microbes from processing and storage stress. The coatings protect microbes from f
description: Many companies are leveraging the power of both natural and synthetic microbes as alternatives to chemical products. Microbes, however, are fragile and difficult to manufacture due to the many stressors during production, storage, and transportation.
technology_description: We have developed a self-assembling coating technology that protects microbes from processing and storage stress. The coatings protect microbes from freeze-drying stress, anaerobes from oxygen exposure, and temperature-sensitive strains from high-temperature storage.

name: SENSAI ANALYTICS Edit

description: At Sensai Analytics, we develop scalable machine learning models that are applicable in a broad variety of settings. Through pilot studies, Enterprises are seeing the benefits of using machine learning to turn their data into predictions. However, a lack of data remains a challenge for most businesses, and deploying robust solutions at scale is complicated by the unbalanced nature of internal datasets -- with potentially large volumes of data for one project, and negligible amount for others. At Sensai, we develop robust machine learning algorithms that thrive in such scenarios, allowing predictive capabilities across textual, tabular or time-dependent inputs irrespective of the amount of training data available. We are harnessing our years of experience working on such problems at MIT, Google and Facebook, to build an Enterprise AI platform that allows companies to rapidly turn their existing data into predictions, across all projects. Our models are able to transfer knowledge from rich datasets to all projects with minimal effort - scaling across our customers’ businesses.

name: SERVICEMOB, INC. Edit
elevator_pitch: serviceMob is analytics solution specifically designed for Customer Service/Support. Our platform takes the dark data of service across the variegated technology stack to unify the view of how effective businesses are at reducing/meeting customer effort. serviceMob reduces contact demand, improves CSAT/NPS, and reduces cost to serve. We provide new industry metrics, which measure how we solve issues vs. operational efficiency metrics which tell us nothing about the effectiveness of our business.
description: serviceMob is a startup based in Southern California with a mission to fix the many inefficiencies in how consumers access and interact with companies when they need customer service. serviceMob utilizes system dynamics to help navigate and reconstruct a true view of effort from the perspective of the customer. Now, businesses can measure something they have been trying for years to measure… RESOLUTION! The resolution rate at the contact level across any channel is extremely difficult for any company to calculate. This is a result of the vast amount of data in service and the thousands of data models which exist in this technological jungle! The technology employs predictive analytics, machine learning, and artificial intelligence to provide specific Industry and Business Segment metrics. Through integration, our platform can further make recommendations to improve product, services, goods, which improves revenue, reduces churn, and improves gross margin.
technology_description: serviceMob integrates via standard pub/sub APIs and can ingest data in variety of formats. Our system retains an intelligence layer which allows us to decipher any and all data models in this space. serviceMob is able to capture data across each of the systems that make a modern customer interaction possible ; either via accessing the data directly form your vendors, utilizing data in a federated environment (Redshift, Snowflake, etc.), or as simple as flat files. We render data in our frontend and can extend our data model to other tools where marketing, sales, customer success, etc. utilize our data in visualization tools like Tableau, LookerBI, or pushed directly back into your federated data environment.

name: SESAME SUSTAINABILITY Edit
elevator_pitch: Sesame Sustainability provides a software solution to accelerate the planning and verification of industrial decarbonization. We address key pain points (time, knowledge, and resource limitations) in assessing the costs and emissions of low-carbon technologies and supply chain decisions. Current planning and reporting solutions fail to address these complexities of heavy industry, despite it emitting nearly one quarter of global greenhouse gases.
description: Sesame is a simulation, optimization, and analysis software suite to democratize and accelerate the planning and verification of industrial decarbonization efforts. Our technology combines plant-level information with our databases and flexible first-principles models to capture all relevant technical, economic, and regulatory (e.g. the Inflation Reduction Act) aspects that make vetting emerging technologies (e.g. hydrogen, electrification, carbon capture) and portfolio investment and operating strategies so complex. Sesame will enable rapid analysis and serve as a single source of truth across large enterprises and multi-scenario analyses. Industrial and transportation sectors today emit ~46% of global GHGs. While institutional pressures mount, leaders in these companies struggle to plan for and enact deep decarbonization. This is because (1) vetting new industrial technologies (electrolytic hydrogen, novel CCUS, electrification, etc.) is very complex and time intensive (not to mention the significant capital outlays at stake) and (2) incumbent planning and operating solutions lack the technical depth and nuance required of these industries. Hence, in conducting these analyses, key pain points include teams’ time, knowledge, and resource limitations in assessing the costs and emissions of strategic low-carbon technology investments, all of which slow global emissions reduction. With Sesame, we address these challenges via packaging the requisite interdisciplinary expertise and complex modeling capabilities into an accessible, easy-to-use interface. For instance, a chemical manufacturer can easily import and configure plant process data and parameters (boiler information, flow rates, footprint, etc.) to enable quick “plug-and-play” cost and emissions comparison of very different decarbonization options (e.g. hydrogen-natural gas blending for boilers vs. stacking point-source carbon capture onto existing units) all within Sesame.
technology_description: Sesame’s innovation and competitive advantage in the process modeling and decarbonization planning space is three-fold: (1) A flexible, layered software architecture that empowers users to simulate, optimize, and assess highly complex/unique system and supply chain configurations in minutes. (2) Integration of power systems and behind-the-meter renewables models to capture intermittency and marginal emissions dynamics (3) An easy-to-use interface and rich databases that enable novices and experts alike to perform detailed analyses

name: SILVERTHREAD, INC. Edit
elevator_pitch: Silverthread helps organizations modernize, future-proof, and make software cloud-ready with predictive analytics and AI. Our CodeMRI® technology provides a tailored modernization roadmap, benchmarking against thousands of systems, and tools for both business executives and coders. With ROI models and software economics insights, we empower data-driven decisions that reduce waste, boost agility, and build resilient, high-performing software.
description: Silverthread provides enterprises with essential insights and strategies to manage and improve the health of their software assets. Using proprietary tools like CodeMRI® Discovery and CodeMRI® Modernize, we help companies uncover architectural issues, assess software quality, and transform complex systems to support modern development needs. Our approach focuses on enabling companies to move from monolithic to modular architectures that are ready for cloud integration, enhancing both scalability and maintainability. With CodeMRI® Discovery, we offer a detailed view of system health and pinpoint high-impact areas for improvement. CodeMRI® Modernize then provides targeted, efficient refactoring pathways, enabling companies to address critical design challenges and reduce long-term maintenance costs. These tools, combined with our consulting expertise, guide organizations in their journey to streamline and optimize software assets, ensuring they are prepared to adapt to future demands. Silverthread has supported major decisions across industries, from aerospace to software acquisitions, where our insights have shaped more than $2 billion in capital allocation and helped assess technical health for M&A evaluations. Our work also supports organizations in updating and scaling large legacy systems, bringing clarity and structure to modernization efforts that can otherwise be risky and costly. For enterprises looking to address technical health challenges, Silverthread’s consulting services and CodeMRI® tools offer a path to more agile, resilient software. With clear, actionable insights and a focus on sustainable transformation, we help organizations turn software into a reliable, high-performing asset equipped for the future.
technology_description: Please enterSilverthread’s patented technology leverages advanced dynamic analysis, predictive analytics, and artificial intelligence to assess and improve software architecture, enabling organizations to manage complexity and modernize effectively. The foundation of Silverthread’s CodeMRI® technology includes a patented approach to dynamic architecture transformation and economic impact modeling. Using graph theory, CodeMRI® maps and analyzes structural dependencies within codebases, exposing issues like hidden complexity and tightly coupled components that can undermine performance, scalability, and long-term maintainability. Silverthread’s dynamic analysis patent focuses on guiding architecture transformation, helping organizations shift monolithic systems into modular, cloud-ready architectures. This approach tracks code structure evolution over time, allowing for real-time analysis of technical health and providing clear recommendations for reducing dependencies and improving modularity. By using dynamic feedback loops, this technology ensures architectural improvements align with evolving business goals and development cycles, allowing organizations to scale systems effectively without accruing unmanaged complexity. The economic modeling patent enables Silverthread to quantify the financial impact of technical health on productivity, defect rates, and maintenance costs. This patent combines predictive analytics and artificial intelligence to create economic models that project the ROI of modernization efforts, refactoring, and architectural transformations. By correlating structural complexity with key business metrics, this modeling technology supports executive-level decisions, enabling leaders to allocate resources to the highest-value projects. Finally, graph-theory algorithms power Silverthread’s predictive capabilities, providing a detailed, scalable view of system interdependencies. These algorithms assess and prioritize areas for improvement, minimizing disruption and reducing long-term costs. With artificial intelligence enhancing predictive accuracy, Silverthread’s technology offers a data-driven, future-focused approach to maintaining and improving technical health. Silverthread’s innovations support companies in building software systems that are agile, resilient, and aligned with modern business demands.

name: SIRNAGEN THERAPEUTICS Edit
elevator_pitch: siRNAgen Therapeutics is a seed stage RNAi platform technology company founded in 2019 with lead candidates in fibrosis and dermatology as well as an active and diverse pipeline in CNS, metabolic, inflammatory, infectious, and other indication areas.
description: RNAi is a gene-silencing process by suppressing the mRNA-protein translation via RISC (RNA Induced Silencing Complex). This process is triggered by double stranded RNA (dsRNA). Long dsRNAs from intrinsic or external source are cut by dicer enzyme into short (~21 nucleotides) duplexed nucleotides. These small fragments, referred to as small interfering RNAs (siRNA), constitute the RNA-induced silencing complex (RISC) and leads to the cleavage of the target mRNA. siRNA can be synthesized chemically and introduced to cytoplasm, which share the same mechanism of RISC.
technology_description: SAMiRNA is a platform to make platforms, combining the conjugation and nanoparticle encapsulation strategies by doubly-conjugating RNAi with hydrophilic and hydrophobic modular components, resulting in self-assembling nanoparticle design ideal for optimizing delivery

name: SMARTAPPS INC. Edit
elevator_pitch: SmartApps is building the first generative business intelligence platform to help businesses of any size to turn data into intelligence by automating the tedious manual steps involved in creating and operationalizing BI dashboards. The current pilot provides a natural language interface to build complex dashboards within minutes. It also integrates with existing frontends such Apache Superset. SmartApps automatically generates all required data models and transformations to serve the dashboa
description: Startups navigate through a rapidly changing world, where quick insights and decision making is critical. Unfortunately, traditional business intelligence tools are too cumbersome and inefficient to quickly deliver actionable insights in startups, where the needs are much more pressing, and resources are far scarcer. At SmartApps, we are building simpler interfaces to quickly gather business intelligence while a generative engine automatically creates all required workflows and frontends behind the scenes, enabling analysts and decision makers to focus on their business questions.
technology_description: Current BI architectures are rooted in older days when analytical processing in databases used to be slow and non-interactive. As a result, these architectures pull data out from the data platform into an external BI engine before the analysts could get started. Such a design blocks analysts from getting started quickly, makes it tedious to optimize dashboards in custom BI engines with limited data processing capabilities, puts the onus of creating complex data models on highly scarce data engineers, and makes the data platforms completely unaware (and unoptimized) for the BI app running on top. The pull-based architecture is outdated, even more so with today’s scalable and highly efficient data clouds that provide unmatched performance. SmartApps inverts the pull-based architecture into a push-based one, allowing analysts to specify the business intelligence application declaratively and then generates all required data workflows that are pushed into the data platforms for efficient execution.
contact: 3600 136th Pl SE Suite 300, Bellevue, WA, 98006 • alekh@tursio.ai, startupexchange-admin@mit.edu, startupexchange@mit.edu
keywords: business intelligence, Generative, Data cloud, workflows, Optimizations, natural language

name: SOS CARBON Edit
elevator_pitch: SOS Carbon revolutionizes sustainable agriculture with seaweed-based biostimulants that reduce synthetic fertilizer use and boost crop yields. Our vertically integrated process begins with harvesting sargassum at sea, transforming an environmental, social, and economic crisis into a valuable resource. Operating in four countries, we leverage the Dominican Republic’s strategic advantages for raw material sourcing, free trade zone manufacturing, and connectivity to developed markets, ensuring ef
description: SOS Carbon is an innovative climate-tech and ag-tech company dedicated to addressing environmental and agricultural challenges through sustainable solutions. Founded at MIT, one of the key systems developed is the Littoral Collection Module (LCM) system, the most cost-effective technology to harvest invasive sargassum seaweed at sea. This prevents its harmful impact on coastal ecosystems and economies while employing the local communities and enabling a reliable supply chain of the seaweed. SOS Carbon then processes sargassum into Marine Symbiotic, a biostimulant. Marine Symbiotic enhances soil health, increases crop yields, and reduces the need for synthetic fertilizers. Our operations span four countries for seaweed management and sourcing, strategically utilizing the Dominican Republic for both sourcing and product processing.
technology_description: SOS Carbon's technology is centered around the Littoral Collection Module (LCM), a patent-pending net-based system designed for efficient sargassum harvesting at sea. This system is deployable on artisanal boats, enabling local fishermen to collect sargassum before it reaches the shore. The collected seaweed is then processed using proprietary methods to remove impurities and produce Marine Symbiotic, a seaweed-based biostimulant. SOS is on track to develop a product portfolio of a variety of products to propel a regenerative agriculture globally. Our vertically integrated approach ensures a streamlined process from ocean harvesting to biostimulant production, driving both environmental and socioeconomic benefits. Additionally, we are working on obtaining carbon offsetting and credits, further emphasizing our commitment to sustainability. LCM system: https://www.instagram.com/p/CiA8O8MAQ0w/ Other tech developed: Sargassum Ocean Sequestration of Carbon (SOS Carbon): a system to intercept and sink the sargassum in the open ocean. This allowing us to sequester the CO2 contained in the seaweed. We successfully developed and validated this technology at scale on 2019 in the Dominican Republic with a DR Navy vessel and the support from the private/public sector in the DR. https://youtu.be/lQJlionZ9qc

The "hardware" portion of our dual-use technology is focused on addressing the satellite 'last mile' problem that will be faced by major lasercom architectures like Kuiper, Starlink, and SDA. Our network fanout solution is a lasercom analog of a 'WiFi router' for LEO that will enable small satellites continuous ground access, boosting downlink capa
description: While some space infrastructure developments, such as the Space Development Agency's Transport Layer and commercial plays like SpaceX's Starlink and Amazon Kuiper, aim to create in-space internet backbones, they will fail to reach the growing number of small to medium-sized satellites entering the market at an exponential rate. As a result, there is currently no way to fan-out these in-space data backbones to reach the expanding satellite market, further taxing the limited RF downlink resources that currently exist. Moreover, once the chosen data is finally streamed to terrestrial servers, industries on Earth and satellite operators in space struggle with making space-derived data accessible for broad industry use. Satellite earth observation data is often in the form of large and complex datasets, which can be difficult for non-experts to work with. Additionally, accessing this data can be expensive, limiting the number of potential users who can benefit from it, especially those who work in developing countries or fields with limited budgets that do not have aerospace expertise.
technology_description: SpaceRake is developing a patent-pending orbital optical communication "Router." This router will allow for multiple simultaneous, full-duplex links through a single communications terminal, connecting up to 10 independent satellites orbiting in formation with the Router-enabled spacecraft. The Router spacecraft will have a long-distance optical link into the orbital backbone infrastructure constellations, creating the "last mile" connection for IP constellations to reach end users in space. SpaceRake is also creating an API-first online service for data access, creating connections to data supply sources, and standardizes imagery metadata. SpaceRake is developing novel Large Language Model interfaces to help users navigate the complexity of Earth observation data. These interfaces will allow human-machine interactions that can execute complex searches and analyses with simple language interactions. By unlocking the value of space data for non-experts, SpaceRake aims to facilitate increased collaboration between the aerospace industry and other industries on Earth.

name: STEPWISE ELECTRIC INC. Edit
elevator_pitch: Stepwise offers an easier, faster and more affordable solution for people to go electric in their homes. We do this via a system of proprietary modular hardware that attach to appliances and make static loads in the home (e.g., EV charging, electric HVAC, water heating) more dynamic and controllable. As a result, we save thousands of dollars for consumers by reducing cost of installation and save millions of dollars for grid operators by providing a means for them to dynamically respond to demand fluctuations in the grid.
description: Stepwise’s strategic value proposition lies in its ability to accelerate the transition to an electrified future by making home electrification affordable, equitable, and efficient. By eliminating the need for costly and time-consuming electric panel upgrades, Stepwise removes a major barrier to adopting EV chargers, heat pumps, and other electrified devices, enabling broader access to clean energy technologies. Its innovative EV Tap™ solution optimizes existing home electrical capacity, significantly reducing installation costs for homeowners while minimizing the strain on utility infrastructure. By empowering utilities to manage demand peaks and integrate distributed energy resources (DERs), Stepwise contributes to a more resilient, sustainable grid, fostering societal progress toward decarbonization and energy equity.
technology_description: Our technology is hardware-enabled software. The hardware acts like an IoT solution that is installed at the circuit level between a home's electric panel and an appliance. It uses an algorithm to orchestrate energy distribution by monitoring the real time electricity usage of the panel and reallocating electric capacity between devices, such as from an EV charger to a resistive heater. The algorithm can work both at a local level in the home and connect to the Stepwise cloud in order to respond to utility grid level signals. Hardware is patent pending.

With 3D imagery analysis, we will provide the Air Force an easy way to measure crater volumetrics and provide 3D spatial awareness. This technology can similarly be used in the insurance, construction, and mining industries.
technology_description: Stitch3D’s software solution is purely web-based, running render operations using WebGL and performing analytics on a cloud compute server instance. The technology stack includes a Python-based backend, JavaScript frontend , and open-source APIs. Our point cloud conversion algorithms are also written in Python, using open-source libraries combined with proprietary code. Stitch3D’s digital architecture combines client-side rendering for visualization with server-side operations involving user creation, authentication, file uploads and computationally intensive processes, which are performed on the cloud. Our web-based workflow has been optimized to visualize billions of points and rapidly analyze features present in the scan.

In previous generations, companies focused on DNA delivery without controlled expression. In more recent years, RNA therapeutics have emerged as safer, easier to deliver alternatives. Strand Therapeutics exists at the intersection between synthetic biology and RNA therapies: the only company that has built the synthetic biology programming language of RNA therapeutics.
description: Strand Therapeutics is a biotech startup developing drugs to treat cancer. We developed a drug candidate made of self-replicating mRNA that can make cancers more responsive to immunotherapy. Once our mRNA therapy is administered to a patient, the tumors become more noticeable to the immune system, which can now attack the tumors, forming an immune response that provides curative immune memory. We additionally developed a new synthetic mRNA programming technology to make our drug candidate safer than other gene therapies, as well as more effective in patients. While the near-term focus of the company is to treat cancer, our platform technology has implications beyond cancer and can also be used for many other purposes including gene editing and replacement.
